questions.question: The Drake Passage and the Strait of Magellan can be found near the southern tip of what continent?

questions.questionZh: 卡宾达位于刚果民主共和国大西洋短海岸线以北，是哪个非洲国家的飞地？

questions.questionZh: 这个问题是在波多黎各写的，波多黎各是……之一？

questions.question: The Appalachian Trail passes through which of the following states?
questions.questionZh: 阿巴拉契亚小道经过以下哪个州？

questions.question: What is the name of the largest lake in Utah?
questions.questionZh: 犹他州最大的湖叫什么名字？

questions.question: Which modern-day country contains land once controlled by the Roman Empire?
questions.questionZh: 现代哪个国家拥有曾经被罗马帝国控制的土地？

questions.question: What state capital in the shadow of the Rocky Mountains is often called the "Mile High City?"
questions.questionZh: 哪个州首府位于落基山脉的阴影下，通常被称为“英里高城”？

questions.question: The Soviet Union's irrigation projects dried up much of which body of water in Central Asia?
questions.questionZh: 苏联的灌溉项目干涸了中亚的哪个水体？

questions.question: A massive 2004 earthquake under which ocean caused tsunamis in the Maldives and Seychelles?
questions.questionZh: 2004 年的一次大地震在哪片海域引发了马尔代夫和塞舌尔的海啸？

questions.question: Roman Catholicism is popular on the island of Luzon in which Southeast Asian country?
questions.questionZh: 罗马天主教在哪个东南亚国家的吕宋岛盛行？

questions.question: The 13th-century Mongol Empire never invaded any part of which country?
questions.questionZh: 13世纪的蒙古帝国从未入侵过哪个国家的任何地区？

questions.question: Which country's Dalmatian Coast is home to beaches along the Adriatic Sea?
questions.questionZh: 哪个国家的达尔马提亚海岸拥有亚得里亚海沿岸的海滩？

questions.question: Spicy Szechuan sauce is named after the province of Sichuan in what country?
questions.questionZh: 四川辣酱是以哪个国家的四川省命名的？

questions.question: On a cartogram where the area of each country is adjusted to correspond with oil production, which country is the largest?
questions.questionZh: 在根据石油产量调整每个国家面积的地图上，哪个国家最大？

questions.question: Which Central African nation is named after a lake that has shrunk dramatically in size due to desertification?
questions.questionZh: 哪个中非国家以因荒漠化而面积急剧缩小的湖泊命名？

questions.question: The Sherpa people, well-known for their climbing expertise, mostly live in the high mountains east of what capital city?
questions.questionZh: 以攀岩技艺闻名的夏尔巴人大多居住在哪个首都城市以东的高山上？

questions.question: If as AFS exchange student you skied in the Alps before travelling to Munich for Oktoberfest, you would be in what German region?
questions.questionZh: 如果作为 AFS 交换生，您在前往慕尼黑参加啤酒节之前在阿尔卑斯山滑雪，您会去德国哪个地区？

questions.question: What city, the capital of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, is sometimes called the largest French-speaking city in the world?
questions.questionZh: 刚果民主共和国的首都哪个城市有时被称为世界上最大的法语城市？

questions.question: An August 2020 COVID-19 outbreak at the University of Notre Dame led to health concerns in what U.S. state's town of South Bend?
questions.questionZh: 2020 年 8 月，圣母大学爆发的 COVID-19 疫情引发了美国哪个州的南本德镇的健康问题？

questions.question: The Mercator map projection over-exaggerates land masses in the polar and Arctic regions, making what island seem larger than it actually is?
questions.questionZh: 墨卡托地图投影过度夸大了极地和北极地区的陆地面积，使哪个岛屿看起来比实际更大？

questions.question: Which of these countries, where motorcycles race in Maseru, is an enclave of South Africa?
questions.questionZh: 在马塞卢举行摩托车比赛的这些国家中，哪一个是南非的飞地？

questions.question: This country’s city of Constanta lies near the Black Sea, while its city of Timişoara is near its border with Serbia. This country’s historical regions of Wallachia and Moldavia lie south and east, respectively, of its more famous region of Transylvania, which is home to an ethnic Hungarian minority. For the point, name this Balkan country where a Romance language is spoken in its capital city of Bucharest.
questions.questionZh: 该国的康斯坦察位于黑海附近，而蒂米什瓦拉靠近与塞尔维亚的边界。该国历史上的瓦拉几亚和摩尔达维亚分别位于其更著名的特兰西瓦尼亚地区的南部和东部，后者有大量匈牙利族少数群体。该国首都布加勒斯特使用一种罗曼语族语言。这个巴尔干国家是哪个？

questions.question: Many street vendors hawk legal and illegal goods on this city’s Khaosan Road. This city’s Erawan Shrine, which houses a statue of Phra Phrom, is located in its Pathum Wan district. Its Wat Phra Kaew [Wat Frah Kow] temple was built under the Chakri Dynasty. The Chao Phraya [Chow Pry-Uh] River flows through this city and passes by its Grand Palace. King Rama IX [the ninth] Park is in, for the point, what capital of Thailand?
questions.questionZh: 这座城市的考山路上有许多街头商贩售卖合法或非法商品。其巴吞旺区有供奉梵天像的四面佛神龛。玉佛寺建于却克里王朝时期。湄南河穿过该城并流经大皇宫。九世王公园位于这座城市。问：这是泰国的哪座首都？

questions.question: The New and Alamo Rivers are two inflows to a lake named for this resource. That lake named for this resource was created when the Colorado River overflowed into the Imperial Valley. This resource also names a body of water fed by the Bear and Jordan Rivers, and which is the largest remnant of Lake Bonneville. For the point, the Bonneville flats and the largest lake in Utah are named after what resource measured by salinity?
questions.questionZh: 新河与阿拉莫河注入一座以这种资源命名的湖泊。该湖由科罗拉多河泛滥进入帝王谷形成。另一个以该资源命名的水体由贝尔河和约旦河注入，是邦纳维尔湖最大遗迹。问：邦纳维尔盐滩和犹他州最大湖泊都以哪种由盐度衡量的资源命名？

questions.question: This shape names a disputed area around the city of Hala’ib, which borders the unclaimed Bir Tawil. It’s not a crescent, but an infamous opium-producing region in Southeast Asia is known as the “Golden” one of these shapes. Many aircraft and ships have supposedly disappeared in a region named for this shape. For the point, the region between Miami, Puerto Rico, and Bermuda is named for what shape?
questions.questionZh: 这种形状的名字用于哈拉伊卜争议地区（其旁是无人认领的比尔泰维勒）。东南亚一个臭名昭著的鸦片产区被称为“金三角”。也有不少飞机和船只据称在以这种形状命名的区域失踪。问：位于迈阿密、波多黎各和百慕大之间的区域以什么形状命名？

questions.question: Popular natural attractions on one island in this archipelago include the Na Pali Coast and Waimea Canyon. The Banzai Pipeline is a beach on this archipelago, which hosts the Triple Crown of Surfing. Haleakala is a dormant shield volcano on this island group, where the 2018 lower Puna eruption took place on Kilauea. For the point, name this island group including Maui and Oahu.
questions.questionZh: 该群岛中某岛的著名自然景观包括纳帕利海岸和威美亚峡谷。班赞管浪点位于该群岛，并举办冲浪三冠赛。哈雷阿卡拉是该群岛上的一座休眠盾状火山，2018年普纳低地喷发发生在基拉韦厄。问：包含毛伊岛和瓦胡岛在内的这个群岛叫什么？

questions.question: This river begins at Lake Hazar, while the ancient city of Opis was supposedly located near its confluence with the Diyala. This river marks the easternmost portion of Syria’s border before it joins the Great Zab near Mosul. At Al-Qurnah, it joins a more western river to form the Shatt-al-Arab. For the point, Baghdad is on what second-longest Mesopotamian river, after the Euphrates?
questions.questionZh: 这条河发源于哈扎尔湖，古城奥皮斯据称位于其与迪亚拉河汇合处附近。它构成叙利亚边境最东段，随后在摩苏尔附近与大扎布河汇合。在库尔纳，它与更靠西的一条河汇流形成阿拉伯河。问：巴格达位于哪条两河流域第二长河（仅次于幼发拉底河）？

options.label: D
options.text: Tigris River Page 1 International Geography Bee Regionals 2018-2019 Replacements

questions.question: In the city of Cayambe, the Quitsato [Keet-sato] Sundial contains a line of pebbles to represent this entity. Another monument to this entity is located in Pontianak, Indonesia. This entity passes through the Ecuadorian Middle of the World City, which is located at 0 degrees latitude. For the point, name this entity that divides the world into northern and southern hemispheres.
questions.questionZh: 在卡扬贝市，Quitsato 日晷用一排鹅卵石表示这个天体。另一个位于基多的"赤道纪念碑"（Mitad del Mundo）也标志着这个天体相关的地理特征。请说出这个天体。

questions.question: This city is ringed by the A90 [A-Ninety] Motorway, which is officially named the G.R.A. [G-R-A] and called “The Junction.” The St. Angelo Bridge and the Milvian Bridge are ancient arch bridges still serving pedestrians in this capital of Lazio. One road that connected this city to Brundisium was known as the Appian Way. For the point, name this home of the Colosseum, the capital of Italy.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市被A90环城公路包围，该路正式名称为G.R.A.。圣天使桥和米尔维奥桥是这座拉齐奥首府仍供行人使用的古老拱桥。连接该城与布林迪西的一条古道名为阿庇亚大道。问：这座拥有斗兽场的意大利首都是哪座城市？

questions.question: This country’s Jurong Island serves as a base of operations for numerous petrochemical companies. Examples of innovative architecture in this country include its ArtScience Museum, which is shaped like a lotus leaf, and its Marina Bay Sands resort. The People’s Action Party leads this country, which has strict laws on littering and chewing gum. For the point, name this city-state located on the edge of the Malay peninsula.
questions.questionZh: 该国的裕廊岛是众多石化企业的运营基地。其创新建筑包括莲叶造型的艺术科学博物馆和滨海湾金沙度假区。人民行动党长期执政，该国对乱扔垃圾和嚼口香糖有严格法规。问：这个位于马来半岛边缘的城邦国家是哪个？

questions.question: This city’s tallest building is the Britam Tower, which is in its Upper Hill district. Due to its large Somali population, this city’s suburb of Eastleigh is known as “Little Mogadishu.” This city’s matatu buses transport people to its Maasai market and its Kibera slum. Al-Shabaab claimed responsibility for a 2013 attack on the Westgate shopping mall in this city. For the point, name this capital of Kenya.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市最高楼为位于上山区的Britam大厦。因索马里人口众多，其东利区被称为“小摩加迪沙”。该城的matatu小巴把人们送往马赛市场和基贝拉贫民窟。青年党声称对2013年该城西门购物中心袭击负责。问：这是肯尼亚哪座首都？

questions.question: In this state, the Weymouth Fore River flows into the sea between Hingham and Quincy Bays. A body of water on this state’s coastline extends north to Cape Ann, home to the fishing city of Gloucester [glaw-ster]. Also on this state’s coastline is the Presidential Library of John F. Kennedy, just south of a harbor that was polluted in 1773 by unruly colonists wearing Native American costumes. For the point, name this New England state whose coastline includes Boston Harbor.
questions.questionZh: 在这个州，韦茅斯前河在欣厄姆湾和昆西湾之间注入海洋。该州海岸线上有一片水域向北延伸到安角，那里有渔业城市格洛斯特。该州海岸线上还有约翰·F·肯尼迪总统图书馆，位于一处港口以南，而该港口在1773年曾被打扮成美洲原住民的殖民者倾倒污染物。问：这个海岸线包含波士顿港的新英格兰州是哪个？

questions.question: In this region, the Sesriem gate allows access to a national park. Brown fur seals form a breeding colony along this region’s Cape Cross. An annual sailing event begins in this desert’s city of Ludëritz. John Henry Marsh’s book on a shipwreck on the Dunedin Star inspired the name of a portion of this desert called the Skeleton Coast. The Herero people live north of this desert, which is west of the Kalahari Desert. For the point, name this desert of southwest Africa.
questions.questionZh: 在这一地区，塞斯里姆大门可进入国家公园。棕色毛皮海豹在该地区的十字角形成繁殖群。该沙漠的吕德里茨市每年举办一项帆船赛事。约翰·亨利·马什关于“达尼丁之星”沉船的著作启发了该沙漠一段海岸“骷髅海岸”的命名。赫雷罗人居住在这片沙漠以北，而它位于卡拉哈里沙漠以西。问：这是非洲西南部的哪片沙漠？

questions.question: The “pharaoist” [pharaoh-ist] hip hop group IAM [I am] was formed in this city. In 2004, the CMA CGM Tower was built in this city. The fish stew bouillabaisse originated in this city, which is home to the prison fortress of Chateau d’If. Pied-noirs rushed to this city in 1962, and a large Corsican community lives in this city, which has historically been its country’s main Mediterranean port. Originally called Massalia by the Romans, for the point, name this second most populous city in France.
questions.questionZh: “法老派”嘻哈组合 IAM 组建于这座城市。2004年，CMA CGM大楼在此建成。鱼汤马赛鱼汤起源于此城，这里还有伊夫堡监狱要塞。1962年，大量“黑脚人”涌入这座城市，且当地有庞大的科西嘉社群；它历来是本国主要的地中海港口。该城在罗马时期称为 Massalia。问：这是法国第二大城市哪座？

questions.question: The central deity of this event is married to a god who oversees a realm that contains crashing mountains and winds containing knives. Toys are brought for the “little angels” during this event. A dough-based drink called atol is sometimes drunk during this holiday, during which a prominent parade is held in the city of Mérida. During this holiday, merchants at the Alfeñique fair in Toluca sell sugar skulls. For the point, name this three-day Mexican holiday at the end of October and start of November that honors the deceased.
questions.questionZh: 这一节日的核心神祇嫁给了一位掌管“坠山与刀风之境”的神。节日期间，人们会为“小天使”带来玩具。假期中有时会饮用一种面糊饮料 atol，并在梅里达市举行重要游行。在托卢卡的 Alfeñique 集市上，商贩会出售糖骷髅。问：这是哪个在10月底到11月初、为期三天、纪念逝者的墨西哥节日？

questions.question: The largest city in this region hosts the largest fish market in the world. A disaster named for this region was caused along the boundary of the Philippine Sea Plate; Frank Lloyd Wright’s Imperial Hotel withstood that 1923 earthquake. This region includes parts of seven prefectures and is home to its country’s largest plain. Yokohama can be found on the island of Honshu in, for the point, what region of Japan containing Tokyo?
questions.questionZh: 该地区最大城市拥有全球最大的鱼市。以该地区命名的一场灾害发生在菲律宾海板块边界；弗兰克·劳埃德·赖特设计的帝国饭店在1923年地震中幸存。该地区涵盖七个都道府县的一部分，并拥有该国最大平原。横滨位于本州岛上的这一地区。问：包含东京的日本这一地区是哪里？

options.label: A
options.text: Kanto region  Page 1 US Elementary and Middle School Nationals - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Finals

questions.question: A traditional form of this cuisine known as khorkhog often uses lamb or goat, cooked with a set of large rocks. A chain founded in Missoula, Montana called HuHot specializes in this type of cuisine, as does BD’s, which claims that this cuisine originated from a style of meal-preparation involving warriors cooking on their shields. This cuisine was invented in Taiwan, rather than the namesake country. Meat and vegetables are stir fried on a griddle in, For the point, what type of cuisine that one can eat at Genghis Grill?
questions.questionZh: 这种菜系有一种传统做法叫 khorkhog，常用羊肉或山羊肉与加热石块同烹。美国蒙大拿州米苏拉创立的 HuHot 连锁、以及 BD’s 等餐厅都主打这种菜系；后者还宣称其起源于战士在盾牌上烹饪食物的方式。实际上这种菜系诞生于台湾，而非其名字所指国家。其特点是把肉和蔬菜在铁板上翻炒。问：在 Genghis Grill 可吃到的这类菜系叫什么？

questions.question: John Palmer Parker started a namesake ranch on this mountain after being awarded land for helping a king clear a region of wild bulls. Queen Emma once bathed in a lake on this peak when competing for a royal position. A pair of twin telescopes on this peak are a part of the Keck Observatory. When measured from its base below sea level, this mountain is over 10,000 meters tall and over 100 meters taller than its neighbor, Mauna Loa. For the point, name this volcano on Hawaii’s Big Island.
questions.questionZh: 约翰·帕尔默·帕克在这座山上建立了同名牧场，他因协助国王清理野牛而获赐土地。艾玛女王曾在该峰一处湖中沐浴。凯克天文台的一对双子望远镜位于此峰。若从海平面以下的山基测量，这座山超过1万米高，并比邻峰冒纳罗亚高一百多米。问：夏威夷大岛上的这座火山是哪一座？

questions.question: Cities on the coast of this country include Qasr Ahmad near Misrata, as well as the ancient ruins of Leptis Magna. Italy, Nazi Germany, the UK, and the US have occupied Wheelus Air Base near this country’s capital. Another coastal city, Sirte [surt], was the birthplace of a former dictator, while Christopher Stevens was killed in another city on its Mediterranean coast in the US Embassy in 2012. For the point, name this North African country whose cities include Tripoli and Benghazi.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家海岸城市包括米苏拉塔附近的盖斯尔艾哈迈德，以及古城雷普蒂斯·马格纳遗址。意大利、纳粹德国、英国和美国都曾占领其首都附近的惠勒斯空军基地。另一海岸城市苏尔特是其前独裁者出生地；2012年，美国驻地中海沿岸另一城市的大使馆遇袭，克里斯托弗·史蒂文斯遇难。问：这个北非国家、其城市包括的黎波里和班加西，是哪国？

questions.question: cabildos and is located in the basin of the Guayllabamba River. Carondelet Palace, the residence of its country’s head of state, is in this city, which has views of Cotopaxi and lies on the stratovolcano Pinchincha. This city is the capital of a country whose largest city is Guayaquil. The equator passes roughly a mile north of, For the point, what capital city of Ecuador?
questions.questionZh: 这座城市设有 cabildos（市政机构），位于瓜伊亚兰巴河流域。该国元首官邸卡隆德莱宫位于此城，这里可远眺科托帕希火山，并坐落在平钦查火山一带。该城所属国家最大城市是瓜亚基尔。赤道大约从这座城市以北一英里处经过。问：这是厄瓜多尔的哪座首都？

questions.question: Art Gilkey and Mario Puchoz died on this mountain within a year of each other in the 1950s; they now name a memorial at this mountain’s base camp. A resemblance to the Alps led a feature of this mountain near the Baltoro Glacier to be named Concordia. Over three-fourths of climbers of this mountain use its southeastern Abruzzi Spur. This peak was once named for surveror Henry Godwin-Austen, and it is the tallest in the Karakoram Range. For the point, name this second-tallest mountain on Earth.
questions.questionZh: 20世纪50年代，阿特·吉尔基和马里奥·普乔兹在这座山上相隔一年先后遇难；如今山脚大本营有以他们命名的纪念地。因外形类似阿尔卑斯山，这座山靠近巴尔托洛冰川的一处地点被命名为协和地。超过四分之三的登山者经由其东南侧的阿布鲁齐山脊攀登。该峰曾以测量员亨利·戈德温-奥斯汀命名，是喀喇昆仑山脉最高峰。问：地球第二高峰是哪座山？

options.label: D
options.text: K2  Page 2 US Elementary and Middle School Nationals - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Finals

questions.question: The mundu is a popular garment worn in this state that is home to a drive-in beach called Muzhappilangad. The large amount of gold in this state’s Padmanabhaswamy Temple makes it the wealthiest temple in the world. With 1,084 women per 1,000 men, this state has the highest sex ratio in India. Lakshadweep is a union territory found off the coast of this state. The Malabar region is found in this state that is southwest of Karnataka and west of Tamil Nadu. Malayalam is widely spoken in, for the point, what state of southern India that contains Cochin?
questions.questionZh: 在这个邦，mundu 是一种常见服饰；该邦还有名为 Muzhappilangad 的汽车海滩。该邦帕德玛纳巴史瓦米神庙因储藏大量黄金而被称为世界上最富有的寺庙。该邦每1000名男性对应1084名女性，是印度性别比最高的邦。拉克沙群岛位于该邦外海。马拉巴尔地区也在该邦内，地处卡纳塔克邦西南、泰米尔纳德邦以西。马拉雅拉姆语在此广泛使用。问：这个包含科钦的印度南部邦是哪个？

questions.question: The Nassara Strip is a commercialized area in this city whose main movie theater is the Cinema le Normandie. This city contains a national museum where the skull of the “Toumai” hominid is housed. The Daza is the largest ethnic group in this capital city whose wealthy European quarter is based around the Avenue Charles de Gaulle. The Logone Occidental Region is just south of this city originally founded as Fort Lamy. With a name translating to “place of rest” in French, this city can be found on the Chari River that flows into its country’s namesake lake. For the point, name this capital city of Chad.
questions.questionZh: 纳萨拉地带是这座城市的商业区，其主要影院为 Cinema le Normandie。该城有国家博物馆，收藏着“图迈”古人类头骨。达扎族是这座首都最大的族群，其富裕欧洲人社区围绕戴高乐大道分布。洛贡西区位于该城以南；该城最初名为拉密堡。其法语名称意为“休憩之地”，坐落在注入同名湖泊的沙里河畔。问：这是乍得的哪座首都？

questions.question: Though not in Sweden, three stations on this transit system feature GoLibrary book vending machines. In 1993, this transit system launched Translink, which was a forerunner to the Clipper Card system now integrated into its turnstiles. Warm Springs and Richmond are among the termini of this system. On one day in 2009, a then record of over 432,000 people rode this transit system after the temporary closure of the Bay Bridge. Fremont and West Oakland are among the stops along, for the point, what transit system in Northern California?
questions.questionZh: 虽然不在瑞典，这一交通系统有三个车站设有 GoLibrary 图书自动售卖机。1993年，该系统推出 Translink，后来成为如今闸机整合的 Clipper 卡系统前身。Warm Springs 和 Richmond 是该系统两个终点。2009年某天，因海湾大桥临时关闭，该系统单日客流曾创43.2万以上纪录。Fremont 与 West Oakland 都是其站点。问：这是北加州的哪一套交通系统？

questions.question: Along with the Half Moon Caye, this feature is one of the two natural monuments within its country’s only UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ned Middleton came up with the name of this feature that was popularized by his book Ten Years Underwater. Located near the middle of Lighthouse Reef, this feature reaches 407 feet in depth. Stalactites were found to be growing in caves found in this feature that Jacques Cousteau labeled one of the finest SCUBA diving locations on Earth. For the point, name this major tourist attraction in Belize.
questions.questionZh: 与半月礁一起，这一地貌是其国家唯一联合国世界遗产中的两个自然纪念物之一。Ned Middleton 提出这一地貌名称，并因其《Ten Years Underwater》而广为人知。它位于灯塔礁中央，深达407英尺。该地貌洞穴中发现钟乳石生长，雅克·库斯托称其为地球上最佳水肺潜点之一。问：这是伯利兹的哪一著名景点？

questions.question: Near this country’s West Bay Lagoon, tens of billions of dollars have been spent developing its planned Lusail City. The Dukhan field is a major source of oil for this country, which, though not Japan, is home to an Inland Sea where pearl diving is popular. I.M. Pei designed the dhow-shaped Museum of Islamic Art in this country, whose residents have the highest per capita income on Earth. The media network Al-Jazeera is based in this country that, in 2022, will become the first country in the Middle East to host the FIFA World Cup. For the point, name this small country with capital at Doha.
questions.questionZh: 在该国西湾潟湖附近，已投入数百亿美元开发其计划中的卢赛尔新城。杜汉油田是该国重要石油来源。该国（并非日本）也有适合珍珠潜水的“内海”。贝聿铭设计了该国阿拉伯帆船造型的伊斯兰艺术博物馆。该国居民人均收入位居世界前列。媒体网络半岛电视台总部设在该国；该国将在2022年成为中东首个举办世界杯的国家。问：这个首都为多哈的小国是哪个？

questions.question: A legend claimed that after Jesus ascended a mountain near this body of water he looked out and said “beyond [it] there [is] nothing.” A folk song dedicated to this body of water refers to it as a “glorious sea” and makes a reference to the winds that arise in the Barguzin range near it. The nerpa is a species of seal that is endemic to this body of water. Submersibles from the Mir program conducted geological studies of this body of water, which forms the western border of Buryatia in Siberia. For the point, name this deepest lake on Earth, which is found in Russia.
questions.questionZh: 有传说称，耶稣登上一座靠近该水体的山并远眺后说“在它之外再无他物”。一首献给该水体的民歌称其为“光辉之海”，并提到巴尔古津山脉吹来的风。涅尔帕海豹是该水体特有物种。米尔深潜器项目曾在这里进行地质研究。该水体位于西伯利亚，构成布里亚特共和国西部边界。问：这是俄罗斯境内、地球最深的湖泊叫什么？

questions.question: A field named for showing this characteristic contains a popular windsurfing destination in its country known as Lake Cerknika. The Skocjan Caves form a UNESCO world heritage site that demonstrates the contact form of this phenomenon. This phenomenon also names a region extending to the Gulf of Trieste in the northern Adriatic. A plateau that is named for its exhibition of this phenomenon extends through Slovenia. This phenomenon can develop when rocks like dolomite or limestone dissolve. Sinkholes are a common feature of, for the point, what German- named type of topography?
questions.questionZh: 一个展示这种地貌特征的地区里，有该国著名风帆运动地采尔克尼察湖。什科茨扬溶洞是联合国世界遗产，体现了这种地貌的接触类型。这一术语也用于指向亚得里亚海北部的里雅斯特湾一带地区。以该现象命名的高原延伸穿过斯洛文尼亚。当地貌中白云岩或石灰岩溶解时，常会形成这种现象。问：天坑常见于哪种由德语命名的地形类型？

questions.question: Large float parades are held on this country’s holiday of Mashramani. This country’s Cuyuni- Mazaruni region is home to the large Omai gold mine while the mining of the aluminum ore bauxite drives the economy of this country’s city of Linden. This country’s flag depicts a red triangle inside a yellow triangle against a green background with the two triangles having black and white fimbriations respectively. The Essequibo River flows through this nation that is the only English-speaking country in South America. Suriname is to the east of, for the point, what country with capital at Georgetown.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家在 Mashramani 节日会举行大型花车游行。该国库尤尼-马扎鲁尼地区有大型奥迈金矿，其林登市经济受铝土矿开采驱动。该国国旗为绿色底，上有黄色三角与红色内三角，并分别配以白黑边饰。埃塞奎博河流经该国；它是南美洲唯一以英语为官方语言的国家。问：位于苏里南以西、首都为乔治敦的是哪个国家？

questions.question: This national park is the central subject of Donald Finkel’s poetry collection titled Answer Back. Spanning over 50,000 acres, the majority of this national park is found in Edmonson County. The Great Onyx is a feature within this national park that has been linked to the Flint Ridge system. The Green River flows through this national park that is within fifty miles of Bowling Green. Despite its name, this park has never shown evidence of containing the remains of the “wooly” species of its namesake mammal. For the point, name this Kentucky national park containing the longest cave system on Earth.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家公园是唐纳德·芬克尔诗集《Answer Back》的核心主题。公园面积超过5万英亩，多数位于埃德蒙森县。其“大缟玛瑙洞”与燧石岭洞穴系统相连。格林河流经该公园，距离鲍灵格林不足50英里。尽管名字如此，该公园从未发现其同名“长毛物种”哺乳动物遗骸。问：这个位于肯塔基、拥有地球最长洞穴系统的国家公园叫什么？

questions.question: Maria Finucci spelled out the word “HELP” in a UNESCO-backed art installation that is meant to create awareness about this region. Project Kaisei is a Japanese program focusing on this region which Charles J. Moore supposedly discovered this region on his way back from a yacht race. This region can be found in a gyre bound by the latitude lines of 0 and 50 degrees north. This region composes up to 8% of the ocean in which it is found and roughly 10% of fish species in this region are found to have plastic in them. For the point, name this large oceanic garbage patch.
questions.questionZh: 玛丽亚·菲努奇曾在一项联合国教科文组织支持的艺术装置中拼出“HELP”，以提高对该区域的关注。日本的 Project Kaisei 聚焦该区域；据称查尔斯·J·摩尔在一次帆船赛返航途中发现了它。该区域位于一个环流中，大致处在北纬0至50度之间。它占其所在海洋面积最高可达8%，并且该区域约10%的鱼类体内发现塑料。问：这片大型海洋垃圾带叫什么？

questions.question: This location was the site of a drawing of the Hasan Dag mountains, which may be the world’s first map. This location was the site of a “Seated Woman” sculpture featuring a corpulent goddess resting on a throne adorned with leopard heads. James (+) Mellaart excavated this site, where mound settlements were separated by the Carsamba River. No streets existed at this location, whose (*) mudbrick houses were built wall to wall. For the points, name this site that flourished roughly nine thousand years ago, the largest Neolithic settlement found, where studies continue in southern Turkey.
questions.questionZh: 这个地点曾出现一幅哈桑山脉绘图，可能是世界上最早的地图。这里还出土了“坐姿女神”雕像，描绘一位体态丰腴的女神坐在饰有豹首的王座上。詹姆斯·梅拉尔特曾发掘该遗址，这里的土丘聚落被恰尔尚巴河分隔。该地没有街道，泥砖房屋彼此紧贴而建。问：这个约九千年前繁荣、位于土耳其南部、目前仍在研究中的最大新石器时代聚落遗址是哪里？

options.label: D
options.text: Chechnya Page 1 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

questions.question: This island experiences solar tides instead of lunar tides due to its location on an amphidromic point. This volcanic island consists of a larger “nui” section to the west, and a smaller “iti” section to the east. In 1960, its Fa’a’a (+) International Airport was built to facilitate nuclear testing on the islands of Mururora and Fangataufa, over a thousand miles to the south. This island’s traditional (*) otea dance consists of rapid hip-shaking. In 1769, Joseph Banks observed this island’s flora while James Cook studied the transit of Venus. For the points, name this island in French Polynesia where breadfruit was harvested prior to the mutiny on the HMS Bounty.
questions.questionZh: 由于位于无潮点，这座岛经历的是太阳潮而非月潮。该火山岛由西部较大的“nui”和东部较小的“iti”组成。1960年，为支持南方千余英里外穆鲁罗阿和方加陶法岛的核试验，法阿国际机场在此建成。该岛传统 otea 舞以快速摆胯著称。1769年，约瑟夫·班克斯在此观察植物，詹姆斯·库克在此研究金星凌日。问：这座法属波利尼西亚岛屿叫什么？“邦蒂号叛变”前曾在此采集面包果。

options.label: C
options.text: Chechnya Page 1 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

questions.question: Ivan Getting established the basis for this technology by improving upon the World War II-era LORAN system. This technology’s competing WGS-84 and GCJ-02 datums are not reconciled well in China. This technology’s (+) accuracy can be improved via geometric dilution of precision or the method of least squares, either of which require accounting for time dilation. (*) Ronald Reagan promised to make this technology available for civilian use after Korean Air Lines Flight 007 was shot down after accidentally flying into Soviet airspace. For the points, name this satellite-based navigation technology.
questions.questionZh: 伊万·盖廷在二战时期 LORAN 系统基础上改进，奠定了这项技术的基础。这项技术在中国使用的 WGS-84 与 GCJ-02 基准并不完全一致。其精度可通过几何精度衰减或最小二乘法改进，这些都需考虑时间膨胀。大韩航空007航班误入苏联领空被击落后，里根承诺将这项技术开放给民用。问：这项基于卫星的导航技术是什么？

options.label: B
options.text: Chechnya Page 1 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

questions.question: In 2016, a warlord from this region began hosting The Team, a reality TV show based on The Apprentice, and asked his Instagram followers to help him find his missing cat. In 1995, militants from this region led by (+) Shamil Basayev seized nearly 2,000 hostages at a hospital in Budyonnovsk. Russia lost nearly 2,000 tanks during a (*) 1995 war in this region that embarrassed Boris Yeltsin. The strongman Ramzan Kadyrov currently rules this region to the west of Dagestan. Grozny is the capital of, for the points, what disputed Caucasus region of Russia?
questions.questionZh: 2016年，这一地区的一名军阀开办了仿《学徒》的真人秀《The Team》，并在 Instagram 上请粉丝帮忙找猫。1995年，该地区武装分子在沙米尔·巴萨耶夫带领下，在布琼诺夫斯克一所医院劫持近2000名人质。俄罗斯在1995年该地区战争中损失近2000辆坦克，令叶利钦政府难堪。卡德罗夫家族现控制该地区，位于达吉斯坦以西。问：首府为格罗兹尼的俄罗斯高加索争议地区是哪里？

options.label: B
options.text: Chechnya Page 1 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

questions.question: In 1751, this island was visited by a 19-year-old George Washington, who embarked on what would be the only long sea voyage of his life. On this island, the Mount Gay rum distillery was founded in 1703, making it the world’s (+) oldest rum brand. During the 1600s, this island was widely considered the most prosperous British colony in the Americas, but it fell into decline after many of its white settlers moved to the (*) Carolinas in the 1700s. The singer Rihanna was born on this easternmost island of the Lesser Antilles, which has its capital at Bridgetown. For the points, name this former British colony in the eastern Caribbean.
questions.questionZh: 1751年，19岁的乔治·华盛顿曾到访这座岛屿，这也是他人生唯一一次远洋航行。该岛的 Mount Gay 朗姆酒厂创立于1703年，被认为是世界最古老朗姆品牌。17世纪该岛一度被视为美洲最繁荣的英国殖民地，但18世纪许多白人定居者迁往卡罗来纳后开始衰落。歌手蕾哈娜出生于这座小安的列斯群岛最东端岛屿，其首都是布里奇敦。问：这个东加勒比前英国殖民地是哪国？

questions.question: This mountain range looms over Jenny Lake and a line of homesteads known as Mormon Row. The T. A. Moulton Barn, reputedly “the most photographed barn in America,” sits below the (+) three tallest peaks in this mountain range, known as the Cathedral Group. The John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Parkway runs alongside this range, which rises to the north of the ski resort town of (*) Jackson Hole. Its highest peak is nicknamed “The Grand.” For the points, give this Wyoming mountain range that names a national park south of Yellowstone.
questions.questionZh: 这条山脉俯瞰珍妮湖与名为“摩门排屋”的宅地带。被称为“美国拍照最多的谷仓”的 T. A. Moulton 谷仓位于该山脉下方，附近三座最高峰合称“教堂群峰”。小约翰·D·洛克菲勒公园大道沿这条山脉延伸；山脉位于滑雪胜地杰克逊霍尔以北。其最高峰昵称为“The Grand”。问：这是怀俄明州哪条山脉（其名也是黄石以南国家公园名称）？

questions.question: In this country, child laborers still work on the world’s largest rubber plantation, which was built in 1926 after this country’s government gave Firestone Rubber complete control over its finances. After Panama, this country maintains the world’s second-largest (+) maritime registry, with over 3000 ships flying its flag, primarily as a “flag of convenience.” This country lies in a region once known as the Grain Coast, or (*) Pepper Coast. In the 1990s, its dictator Charles Taylor traded guns for blood diamonds from its northwestern neighbor, Sierra Leone. For the points, name this poor West African country originally founded by freed American slaves with capital Monrovia.
questions.questionZh: 在这个国家，童工仍在世界最大橡胶种植园劳动。该种植园建于1926年，当时该国政府将财政完全交由凡士通橡胶公司掌控。继巴拿马之后，该国拥有世界第二大船舶登记册，3000多艘船挂其国旗，多作为“方便旗”。该国位于曾被称作“谷物海岸”或“胡椒海岸”的地区。1990年代，其独裁者查尔斯·泰勒曾以武器换取来自西北邻国塞拉利昂的“血钻”。问：这个由获释美国黑奴建立、首都蒙罗维亚的西非贫困国家是哪个？

questions.question: This region’s flag consisted of small red, white, blue, and black stripes in the top left of a large yellow patch, a symbol of the doctrine “Five races under one union.” An attempt to attract Jews to settle in this region was put forth in the (+) Fugu Plan. As this region was being invaded in Operation August Storm by the Soviet Union, its capital was moved to (*) Tonghua from Hsinking. Puyi was the nominal head of, for the points, what Japanese puppet government set up after the Mukden Incident in Manchuria?
questions.questionZh: 这一地区的旗帜是大片黄色底，左上有红白蓝黑细条纹，象征“五族协和”。“河豚计划”曾试图吸引犹太人迁居该地。苏联“八月风暴行动”入侵该地时，其首都曾从新京迁往通化。溥仪是该地名义上的统治者。问：这是在“九一八事变”后由日本在满洲建立的哪个傀儡政权？

questions.question: This site is home to the village of Sivu’ovi, a prominent settlement of the Basketmaker II era, and other settlements in this site include the Agate House and the Puerco ruins. This site’s “Newspaper Rock” has been inscribed with over 650 (+) petroglyphs by this park’s former inhabitants, the Pueblo. This park’s northern sector extends into the (*) Painted Desert, and its most famous features are the result of burial by volcanic sediment since the Triassic period. For the points, name this national park in Arizona known for its fossilized trees.
questions.questionZh: 该遗址内有 Sivu’ovi 村（篮编者 II 时期重要聚落），其他聚落包括 Agate House 与 Puerco 遗址。这里的“报纸岩”刻有650多幅岩画，出自其早期居民普韦布洛人。公园北部延伸至彩绘沙漠；其最著名景观源于三叠纪以来被火山沉积掩埋形成。问：这是亚利桑那州哪座以树木化石闻名的国家公园？

options.label: A
options.text: Petrified Forest National Park Page 2 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

questions.question: In what is now this country, the fortress of La Goletta overlooked a major port that Spain repeatedly lost and recaptured over the course of a century. This present-day country was the central territory of the Hafsid Dynasty. (+) Spain sent multiple 16th-century expeditions to seize this country’s large, sandy island of Djerba, whose final loss in 1560 occurred during the leadup to the Great Siege of (*) Malta. Fifty years after the conquest of Algeria, this former Ottoman territory became a French protectorate. For the points, name this country where Barbary corsairs were once based in Tunis.
questions.questionZh: 在如今这个国家境内，拉戈莱塔要塞俯瞰一处重要港口，西班牙在一个世纪中多次得而复失。现今该国曾是哈夫斯王朝核心领地。16世纪西班牙多次远征试图夺取该国大沙岛杰尔巴，最终于1560年在马耳他大围攻前后失利。征服阿尔及利亚50年后，这片前奥斯曼领地成为法国保护国。问：这个曾有巴巴里海盗以突尼斯为基地的国家是哪个？

questions.question: In 1905, a band of Igorrote headhunters performed mock tribal ceremonies in this place’s Luna Park. The annual July 4th Nathan’s Hot Dog Eating Contest occurs just off the boardwalk at this location, the site of the New York Aquarium, the Wonder Wheel, and the Cyclone roller coaster. For the point, identify this beach neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York.
questions.questionZh: 1905 年，一群伊戈罗特猎头者曾在此地的月神公园（Luna Park）表演模拟部落仪式。每年 7 月 4 日举行的内森热狗大胃王比赛，就在这里木板步道旁举行；这里还有纽约水族馆、神奇摩天轮（Wonder Wheel）和“旋风”过山车（Cyclone）。请说出纽约布鲁克林这个海滩社区。

questions.question: The Galata Tower is a 14th-century Genoese structure overlooking the historic district of this city. A church designed by Isidore of Miletus in this city was transformed into a mosque in the 15th century but lost its ceremonial functions to the Blue Mosque. The Golden Horn, an inlet of the Sea of Marmara, is the historic harbor of this city. This city straddles the Bosporus, which separates Europe from Asia. For the point, name this most populous city in Turkey.
questions.questionZh: 加拉塔塔是一座建于 14 世纪、俯瞰这座城市历史街区的热那亚建筑。由米利都的伊西多尔设计的该城一座教堂在 15 世纪被改为清真寺，后来其礼仪中心地位被蓝色清真寺取代。马尔马拉海的海湾“金角湾”是这座城市的历史港口。这座城市横跨博斯普鲁斯海峡，而海峡正是欧亚分界线。请说出土耳其人口最多的这座城市。

questions.question: This country’s central region includes the Yushan Mountains and Sun Moon Lake. Kaohsiung is the largest city and port in the south of this country. A skyscraper in this country was inspired by the shape of bamboo and is named for its 101 stories. This island formerly known as Formosa is led by the Kuomintang. For the point, name this country with capital Taipei.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家中部有玉山山脉与日月潭；南部最大的城市与港口是高雄。本国一座摩天楼以竹子的形态为灵感，并因 101 层而得名。这个曾被称为“福尔摩沙”的岛屿，以台北为首都。请说出这个国家（地区）。

questions.question: Ulan-Ude is the capital of this region’s Buryat Republic. The Tunguska Event was a large explosion east of the Yenisey River in this region, where the Angara River drains Lake Baikal. This region’s city of Novosibirsk is on the Ob River, while its port of Vladivostok is on the Sea of Japan. The Ural Mountains serve as the western border of, for the point, what large region of Russia?
questions.questionZh: 乌兰乌德是该地区布里亚特共和国的首府。通古斯大爆炸发生在该地区叶尼塞河以东；发源自贝加尔湖的安加拉河也位于此地。该地区的新西伯利亚位于鄂毕河沿岸，符拉迪沃斯托克（海参崴）港则临日本海。其西界由乌拉尔山脉构成。请说出俄罗斯这一广阔地区。

questions.question: Curitiba is the capital of a Brazilian province that shares its name with this river. The cities of Santa Fe and Rosario are on this river, which receives the Iguazu and Pilcomayo as tributaries. The Yacyreta and Itaipu Dams on this river produce all of Paraguay’s electricity. For the point, name this second-longest South American river, which merges with the Uruguay to form the Rio de la Plata.
questions.questionZh: 库里蒂巴是巴西一个与这条河同名的州的首府。圣菲和罗萨里奥位于这条河沿岸；伊瓜苏河和皮尔科马约河是其支流。该河上的亚西雷塔与伊泰普两座大坝几乎提供巴拉圭全部电力。请说出这条南美第二长河，它与乌拉圭河汇合后形成拉普拉塔河口。

questions.question: This country’s Gotjawal Forest is located south of South Jeolla Province on Jeju Island. The Taebaek Mountains, which lie in the east of this country, are the site of its largest port, Busan. In 1950, UN forces made an amphibious landing at Incheon in this country, whose northern border is formed by the DMZ at the 38th parallel. For the point, name this country with its capital at Seoul.
questions.questionZh: 该国的 Gotjawal 森林位于济州岛、全罗南道以南。位于该国东部的太白山脉附近有其最大港口釜山。1950 年，联合国军曾在该国仁川实施两栖登陆；其北部边界为北纬 38 度线附近的非军事区（DMZ）。请说出首都为首尔的这个国家。

questions.question: The island of Surtsey is one of this type of geological feature, “cinder” examples of which are formed by tephra. The destroyed town of Herculaneum lies near one of these features in Italy. A national park named for these features on Hawaii’s Big Island is home to Mauna Loa. 452 of these lie along the “Ring of Fire” around the Pacific Ocean. For the point, name this type of geological feature whose eruptions can spew ash and lava.
questions.questionZh: 苏尔特塞岛属于这种地质构造的一种；其中“煤渣锥”（cinder cone）由火山碎屑（tephra）堆积形成。这类构造被定义为地壳中岩浆喷出形成的裂缝、喷口或开口。麦吉里弗雷山和圣海伦斯山都属于这种构造。请说出这种地貌类型。

questions.question: This country owns the Kerguelen Islands, as well as the islands of Wallis and Futuna in the south Pacific. In 2018, the Kanak people voted against New Caledonia’s independence from this country. This country owns a South American territory that contains the primary launch site of the European Space Agency, Devil’s Island, and the city of Cayenne. For the point, name this country whose overseas departments include Guadaloupe and Martinique.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家拥有凯尔盖朗群岛，也拥有南太平洋的瓦利斯和富图纳群岛。2018 年，该国海外省瓜德罗普发生大规模抗议，罢工导致燃料短缺和经济停滞。该国的外省还包括法属圭亚那和新喀里多尼亚。请说出这个欧洲国家。

questions.question: Slaves in this country developed capoeira, a martial art that combines acrobatics, dance, and music. This country’s bossa nova style of music is exemplified by the song “The Girl From Ipanema.” The Alvorada Palace and Planalto Palace were both designed by Oscar Niemeyer for this country’s capital. For the point, name this country where the statue of Christ the Redeemer overlooks Rio de Janeiro.
questions.questionZh: 奴隶在这个国家发展出结合杂技、舞蹈与音乐的武术“卡波耶拉”。该国的波萨诺瓦音乐源于桑巴，其东北部的“福罗”（forró）音乐常使用一种手风琴。这个国家还曾举办狂欢节和“六月节”（Festas Juninas）等庆典。请说出这个南美国家。

questions.question: L’Orient exploded during a battle in this sea at Aboukir [AH-boo-ker] Bay. Henry the Navigator captured this sea’s port of Ceuta [THAY-oo-tah], which lies near the Barbary Coast. The Knights Hospitaller operated from Rhodes before moving to Malta, another island in this sea. For the point, name this sea from which Richard the Lionhearted occupied Cyprus and Sicily.
questions.questionZh: 在阿布基尔湾的一场海战中，“东方号”（L’Orient）曾在这片海域爆炸。航海家亨利曾在其岸边夺取休达港；巴巴里海盗在其南岸活动。突尼斯、的黎波里和亚历山大等港口都位于其沿岸。请说出这片海域。

questions.question: The Psychro Cave is a mythical birthplace on this island also home to Lake Kournas and Mount Ida. Chania and Heraklion are cities on this island separated from the mainland by the Kythira Strait. British archaeologist Arthur Evans excavated an ancient palace containing a fresco of a man leaping over a bull on this island south of the Peloponnesus. The Minoan palace of Knossos was built on, for the point, what largest Greek island?
questions.questionZh: 心理洞穴（Psychro Cave）是神话中宙斯的诞生地，位于这座岛上；岛上还有库尔纳斯湖与伊达山。哈尼亚和伊拉克利翁是这座岛上的两座城市，诺索斯宫殿遗址也在此地。请说出这座希腊岛屿。

questions.question: In this city, the restaurant Brennan’s created a dish of bananas served in butter and brown sugar now known as Bananas Foster. Beignets [ben-YAYZ], fried dough pastries covered with sugar, were popularized by this city’s Cafe du Monde. Popular dishes in this city include muffuletta sandwiches, po’ boys, and gumbo. This city’s French Quarter contains Bourbon Street. For the point, name this most populous city in Louisiana.
questions.questionZh: 在这座城市，Brennan's 餐厅创造了“火焰香蕉”（Bananas Foster）。这座城市位于庞恰特雷恩湖与密西西比河之间，著名庆典“狂欢节”（Mardi Gras）就在这里举行。这里是路易斯安那州南部的最大城市。请说出这座城市。

questions.question: This country’s Chuquicamata [Chuh-Quick-a-mah-tuh] is the world’s largest open-pit copper mine by volume. This country controls the Juan Fernandez Islands, which includes Robinson Crusoe Island, while its Atacama Desert sparked the War of the Pacific. Easter Island is controlled by, for the point, what country with its capital at Santiago?
questions.questionZh: 该国的楚基卡马塔（Chuquicamata）是世界上按体积计最大的露天铜矿。该国拥有地球最干燥的沙漠阿塔卡马沙漠。该国国旗上有一颗白色五角星，最南端地带属于巴塔哥尼亚地区。请说出这个首都为圣地亚哥的南美国家。

questions.question: This city’s namesake creek was once a major pearling center, but was dredged in the 1960s to develop its port infrastructure. One line of this city’s driverless Metro runs alongside Sheikh Zayed Road. The Palm Jumeirah and The World are artificial island groups located in the Persian Gulf in this city. For the point, the Burj Khalifa is in what most populous city of the United Arab Emirates?
questions.questionZh: 这座城市同名的小溪曾是主要采珠中心，20 世纪 60 年代为发展港口而被疏浚。该市因有大量高层建筑而被称为“中东曼哈顿”。世界最高建筑哈利法塔（Burj Khalifa）和人工岛“朱美拉棕榈岛”都在此地。请说出这座城市。

questions.question: A 36-course meal known as wazwan is native to this region. This region’s city of Muzaffarabad lies at the junction of the Neelum and Jhelum [Jay-lum] Rivers. Srinagar [Shree-nuh-gur] is the capital of an Indian state in this region west of the disputed territory of Aksai Chin. The Siachen Glacier is located near the Line of Control in, for the point, what region claimed by both Pakistan and India?
questions.questionZh: 一种 36 道菜的宴席“wazwan”源于这一地区。该地区的穆扎法拉巴德位于尼勒姆河与杰赫勒姆河交汇处；其境内的锡亚琴冰川位于被称为“地球第三极”的高原区域。请说出这个有争议地区。

questions.question: According to local legend, the devil once helped construct a bridge in this mountain range’s Schöllenen Gorge. Lake Lucerne is in this mountain range crossed by the Brenner Pass and St. Bernard Pass. Famous skiing destinations in this mountain range include Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn. For the point, name this mountain range that covers much of Austria and Switzerland.
questions.questionZh: 据当地传说，魔鬼曾帮助在该山脉的朔勒嫩峡谷（Schöllenen Gorge）修建桥梁。卢塞恩湖与瓦莱州之间的乌里州位于这条山脉中。这条山脉孕育了莱茵河与罗讷河等河流。请说出这条欧洲山脉。

questions.question: This country and Pakistan are building a namesake “Economic Corridor” that includes the reconstruction of the Karakoram Highway. This country is building railroads in East Africa and Southeast Asia as part of its One Belt, One Road initiative. Shenzhen [SHEN-JEN] and Xiamen [SHEAH-MEN] were some of the first Special Economic Zones in this country. For the point, the Yuan [Yu-an] is the currency of what country with its capital at Beijing?
questions.questionZh: 这个国家与中国正在共建一条名为"经济走廊"的通道，其中包括喀喇昆仑公路的重建工程。该国东部有开伯尔山口，西南部有俾路支省。其人口最多的城市是卡拉奇，首都是伊斯兰堡。请说出这个南亚国家。

questions.question: This region’s Kluane [kloo AH nee] National Park is home to the second-highest peak in North America, while its city of Dawson was founded during a gold rush on the Klondike River. This territory’s eastern border is formed by the Mackenzie River, while its share of the St. Elias Mountains includes Mount Logan. For the point, name this westernmost Canadian territory with its capital at Whitehorse.
questions.questionZh: 该地区的克卢恩（Kluane）国家公园拥有北美第二高峰。其城市白马市（Whitehorse）是首府。该地区与美国的阿拉斯加州接壤，以极光和冰川闻名。请说出加拿大的这个地区。

questions.question: The Aubrey Holes are 56 chalk pits discovered near this location. Historians believe sarsens were transported up the River Avon north of Salisbury to build this landmark, a former site for Druidic religious ceremonies. This site may have been designed to align with the sun on the summer solstice. For the point, name this prehistoric site in England, a large circle of stacked megaliths.
questions.questionZh: 奥布里洞（Aubrey Holes）是在这个地点附近发现的 56 个白垩坑。历史学家认为萨尔森石（sarsens）是通过阿文河被运送到这个地点。这个史前遗址位于英格兰威尔特郡。请说出这个著名遗迹。

questions.question: One island in this country is the namesake of dracaena cinnabari, a type of dragon tree. The Wadi Hadhramaut [Had-ruh-maut] is in the east of this country that has no permanent rivers. Socotra is an island belonging to this country that contains the southwest portion of the Empty Quarter. The Bab-el-Mandeb lies between Djibouti and, for the point, what country with cities Aden and Sanaa?
questions.questionZh: 这个国家的一个岛屿是龙血树（dracaena cinnabari）的命名地。该国的瓦迪哈德拉毛（Wadi Hadhramaut）地区以其泥砖建筑闻名。这个国家曾分为南北两部分，首都是萨那。请说出这个阿拉伯半岛国家。

questions.question: This state’s pink granite Enchanted Rock can be found in its Edwards Plateau, while its cities of Midland and Odessa are near oil reserves in the Permian Basin. The Trinity River and Colorado River flow through major cities in this state, where Big Bend National Park, Brownsville, and El Paso are found along the Rio Grande. For the point, name this state with its capital at Austin.
questions.questionZh: 该州的粉红花岗岩"魔法岩石"（Enchanted Rock）位于爱德华兹高原，而米德兰和敖德萨市则位于该州的二叠纪盆地。该州以孤星州著称，首府是奥斯汀。请说出这个美国州。

questions.question: This country’s Caruachi Dam generates hydroelectric power from the Caroni River. Many tepuis, tall table-like mountains, can be found in this country’s Guiana Highlands. This country’s Catatumbo River experiences hundreds of lightning strikes every day and feeds into its Lake Maracaibo. For the point, Angel Falls and the Orinoco River are in what country with capital Caracas?

options.label: B
options.textZh: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国

questions.questionZh: 该国的卡鲁阿奇大坝在卡罗尼河上发电。许多特普伊山（tepui，平顶山）位于该国，包括奥扬特普伊山（Auyán-tepui），安赫尔瀑布就位于其上。请说出这个南美国家。

questions.question: Many members of this ethnic group live in refugee camps around the city of Cox’s Bazar. A 1982 law denied citizenship to members of this group, who live in the Rakhine State on the Andaman Sea. In 2017, the UN declared the military violence against this group a crime against humanity and criticized State Counsellor Aung San Suu Kyi for inaction. For the point, identify this Islamic ethnic group made effectively stateless by Myanmar.

options.label: B
options.textZh: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国

questions.questionZh: 许多该族成员生活在科克斯巴扎尔市周围的难民营中。1982 年的一项法律剥夺了该族的公民身份。该族主要生活在若开邦地区。请说出这个东南亚少数民族。

questions.question: This country’s city of Kutna Hora is home to the Sedlec Ossuary, which contains an elaborately designed chandelier made of human bones. Less macabre attractions in this country include the Charles Bridge across the Vltava River in its capital, which contains a statue of Saint Wenceslas. Moravia and Bohemia are the primary regions of this country west of Slovakia. For the point, name this Central European country with cities Brno and Prague.
questions.questionZh: 该国的库特纳霍拉市（Kutna Hora）拥有塞德莱茨藏骨堂，其中有一个由人骨精心设计的吊灯。该国的首都是布拉格，拥有著名的查理大桥。请说出这个中欧国家。

questions.question: This feature’s Jinshanling [Jin-shan-ling] section crosses extremely steep slopes. Shanhai Pass, the “First Pass Under Heaven,” is near this strcuture’s end at the Bohai Sea. This structure’s native name refers to its length of ten thousand li. Its longest section stretches from Mount Hu to the Jiayu [Jah-Yu] Pass. For the point, name this 4500-mile long structure completed by Qin Shihuangdi [Chin Shuh-Hwang-Dee] in Northern China.

options.label: A
options.textZh: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国

questions.questionZh: 这个建筑的金山岭段穿越极其陡峭的山坡。山海关被称为"天下第一关"，是这个建筑的东端起点。这个建筑是世界上最长的军事防御工事。请说出这个建筑。

questions.question: This country’s cuisine includes the entrees of Rfissa [Ruh-FISS-uh] and Chicken Bastilla as well as the soup Harira. Bojador and Laayoune are cities controlled by this country in a territory disputed by the Polisario Front. Marrakesh and Casablanca are in this country, which serves as the western terminus of the Atlas Mountains. For the point, name this country with its capital at Rabat.
questions.questionZh: 该国的菜肴包括 Rfissa（一种鸡肉面食）和 Bastilla 鸡肉派，以及 Harira 汤。博贾德角位于该国大西洋海岸。非斯和马拉喀什是该国的历史名城。请说出这个北非国家。

questions.question: This city’s Ajyad Fortress was destroyed to construct the world’s largest clock face and the Abraj Al Bait Towers. A structure in this city is covered by the Kiswah and cleaned twice a year with rose water. That edifice stands 20 meters away from this city’s Well of Zamzam. In this city, a black cube in the Great Mosque is circled seven times during the Hajj. For the point, name this holiest city in Islam.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市的天房禁寺（Masjid al-Haram）内有克尔白。该市的大钟塔和 Abraj Al Bait 塔是世界著名建筑。每年有数百万穆斯林来此朝觐。请说出这座沙特阿拉伯城市。

questions.question: This island’s Chudu Region contains the Akaishi Mountains, which lie south of its Hida and Kiso Mountains. This island’s Tohoku Region contains the Miyagi and Fukushima Prefectures. Hokusai’s South Wind, Clear Sky depicts this island’s Mount Fuji, and its Kanto region includes the city of Yokohama. For the point, Tokyo is on what largest and most populous Japanese island?
questions.questionZh: 该岛的知床半岛包含阿伊努语地名。本州岛是日本最大的岛屿，东京、大阪、名古屋都位于此岛。北海道在本州以北，九州在本州以南。请说出日本这个主岛。

questions.question: The city of Vladikavkaz lies on the Terek River in this mountain range. This mountain range’s largest lake, Lake Sevan, is east of Mount Aragats. Autonomous regions on this range’s northern slopes include Nagorno-Karabakh and Dagestan. This range also contains Chechnya, a Russian subject west of the Caspian Sea. Mount Elbrus is the highest point of, for the point, what mountain range separating Europe from Asia?
questions.questionZh: 弗拉季高加索市位于这个山脉的特雷克河上。这个山脉最大的湖泊是塞凡湖。这个山脉位于黑海和里海之间，是欧亚分界线的一部分。请说出这个山脉。

questions.question: The Lady and the Unicorn tapestries can be found in this city’s Museum of the Middle Ages, which was formerly the Cluny Museum. A former train station in this city now houses Impressionist art as the Musée d’Orsay. This city’s Tuileries [TOOL er ies] Gardens are adjacent to a museum served by a large glass pyramid designed by I.M. Pei [Pay]. For the point, name this city home to the Louvre.
questions.questionZh: 《女士与独角兽》挂毯收藏在这个城市的克吕尼博物馆（Musée de Cluny）。这个城市有埃菲尔铁塔、卢浮宫和凯旋门等地标。请说出法国的首都。

questions.question: Many bright-colored residences line the streets of this city’s Bo-Kaap neighborhood, which lies near Signal Hill. This city is creating desalination plants due to a water crisis based around “day zero.” Devil’s Peak and Table Mountain form this city’s mountainous backdrop. This city’s Robben Island was the site of a prison that housed Jacob Zuma and Nelson Mandela. For the point, name this legislative capital of South Africa.
questions.questionZh: 许多色彩鲜艳的房屋排列在这个城市的波卡普（Bo-Kaap）街区，该街区位于信号山附近。这个城市以桌山和罗本岛闻名。请说出南非的立法首都。

questions.question: A 400-year-old one of these things in the Arabian Desert lies 2 kilometers from Jebel Dukhan, Bahrain’s highest point. A very wide one of these objects is in the center of Santa Maria del Tule in Oaxaca. Examples of these organisms in California national parks include Del Norte Titan and General Sherman. A variety of these organisms are found on Madagascar’s Avenue of the Baobabs. For the point, name these plants that include redwoods and eucalyptus.
questions.questionZh: 阿拉伯沙漠中一个有 400 年历史的此类建筑距离巴林最高点 Jebel Dukhan 2 公里。此类建筑在波斯湾地区用于获取淡水。请说出这种建筑结构。

questions.question: This country’s highest point, the extinct volcano Nevado Sajama, is located in its Oruro Department. This country’s Yungas Road has been called “the most dangerous road in the world.” The Uyuni Salt Falts are in the Altiplano area of this country home to the dried-up lake Poopó [PO-O-PO] and the southern half of Lake Titicaca. For the point, name this country with its capitals at Sucre and La Paz.
questions.questionZh: 该国最高点内瓦多萨哈马火山（Nevado Sajama）位于奥鲁罗省。该国的永加斯路（Yungas Road）被称为"世界上最危险的公路"。首都是拉巴斯。请说出这个南美国家。

questions.question: This city experiences massive tidal peaks called acqua alta. This city’s Piombi Prison is the destination of the Bridge of Sighs, while its Piazza San Marco connects St. Mark’s Basilica to the Doge’s Palace. This city’s namesake lagoon includes Burano and Lido and is enclosed by the Adriatic Sea. For the point, the Grand Canal is the main thoroughfare of what Italian city?
questions.questionZh: 这座城市经常经历名为"acqua alta"的大潮汐。该城市的铅皮监狱（Piombi）是"叹息桥"的目的地。这座城市以运河和贡多拉闻名。请说出这座意大利城市。

questions.question: This state’s Pamola Peak is connected to its highest point by the Knife Edge trail of Baxter State Park. In this state’s coastal Downeast region, Cadillac Mountain overlooks the Atlantic Ocean from Mount Desert Island. Whitewater rafting is popular in the Kennebec Gorge of this state home to Mount Katahdin, the northern terminus of the Appalachian Trail. For the point, Acadia National Park is in what New England state with its capital at Augusta?

options.label: C
options.text: State of Maine Page 1 International Geography Bee Regionals 2018-2019 Round 4
options.textZh: 缅因州第 1 页 国际地理蜜蜂地区赛 2018-2019 年第 4 轮

questions.questionZh: 该州的波莫拉峰（Pamola Peak）通过巴克斯特州立公园的"刀锋小径"（Knife Edge trail）与该州最高点相连。该州的阿卡迪亚国家公园是著名旅游地。请说出这个美国州。

questions.question: This lake contains the extremely densely populated Migingo Island. John Hanning Speke, who names a gulf of this lake, was the first European to view this body of water. The Kagera River flows into this lake, and the cities of Jinja, Entebbe, and Kampala lie along its shores. This lake, the primary source of the White Nile, borders Uganda, Kenya, and Tanzania. For the point, name this largest lake in Africa, named for a 19th-century British Queen.
questions.questionZh: 这个湖包含人口极其密集的米金戈岛（Migingo Island）。约翰·汉宁·斯佩克以他的名字命名了这个湖的一个海湾。这是非洲第二大湖。请说出这个湖泊。

questions.question: White settlers on this island attempted to either kill its native inhabitants or send them to Flinders Island in the “black war.” The thylacine was a carnivorous marsupial called the “tiger” or “wolf” of this island, which is separated from Victoria by the Bass Strait. A namesake “devil” is an endangered species in, for the point, what island state of Australia with its capital at Hobart?
questions.questionZh: 这个岛上的白人定居者曾试图杀死原住民或将他们送到弗林德斯岛，这被称为"黑色战争"。这个岛是澳大利亚最小的州。请说出这个岛屿州。

questions.question: The Welsh settlement of Trelew is the most populous city in the Chubut River Valley of this region. Laguna del Carbon, the lowest point of the Western Hemisphere, is in this region. The Valdes Peninsula is in this region that extends down to Punta Arenas, which lies across the Strait of Magellan from Tierra del Fuego. For the point, name this cold and windy region of southern Chile and Argentina.

options.label: A
options.text: State of Maine Page 1 International Geography Bee Regionals 2018-2019 Round 4
options.textZh: 缅因州第 1 页 国际地理蜜蜂地区赛 2018-2019 年第 4 轮

questions.questionZh: 威尔士人建立的 Trelew 定居点是该地区丘布特河谷人口最多的城市。拉古纳德尔卡本（Laguna del Carbon）是西半球最低点。请说出这个南美地区。

questions.question: This country owns the islands of Likoma and Chizumulu. This country’s Michiru Mountain is located near its “commercial capital” of Blantyre. This country’s Shire Highlands are named for its longest river, whose source is an African Great Lake on the eastern border of this country. For the point, Lilongwe is the capital of what African nation with a namesake lake bordering Tanzania and Mozambique?
questions.questionZh: 该国拥有利科马岛和奇祖穆卢岛。该国的米奇鲁山位于其"商业首都"布兰太尔附近。首都是利隆圭。请说出这个东南非国家。

questions.question: This biome is denoted as ET in the Koppen climate classification system. Stunted forests in this biome are known as Krummholz and occur lower in elevation than this biome’s “Alpine” variety. This biome, which occurs closer to the poles than Taiga, is home to musk ox, caribou, and lichens, and is usually characterized by permafrost. For the point, name this treeless biome found in extremely cold areas.
questions.questionZh: 这种生物群落在柯本气候分类系统中被标记为 ET。这种群落中的矮曲林被称为"克鲁姆霍尔兹"（Krummholz）。这种群落位于高纬度或高海拔地区。请说出这种生物群落。

questions.question: This peninsula is home to the incomplete Diamond Tower, which will be the first building to twist 360 degrees. Another under construction tower on this peninsula is a 3,300 foot neo-futurist project designed by Adrian Smith. This peninsula is also home the world’s tallest building, Burj Khalifa. For ten points, name this peninsula whose skyscrapers are centered in cities such as Jeddah, Dubai, and Mecca.
questions.questionZh: 这个半岛上有未完工的钻石塔，这将是第一座 360 度旋转的建筑。另一个扭曲的摩天大楼卡延塔（Cayan Tower）也位于这个半岛上的城市。请说出这个半岛。

questions.question: One of these systems in Glasgow consists of two concentric circles and is operated by the Strathclyde Partnership. One of these systems found in Paris has several cast iron entrances designed by Hector Guimard. Portions of one of these systems in London include Euston and Paddington. For ten points, name these systems of trains that run underground, which are often called rapid transit systems.
questions.questionZh: 格拉斯哥的一个此类系统由两个同心圆组成，由 Strathclyde 合作伙伴运营。伦敦的此类系统有环线、区域线等多条线路。请说出这种交通系统。

questions.question: The village of Zermatt is overlooked by this mountain and is the base for most climbs of this mountain. This mountains first ascent included Lord Francis Douglas and ended with four of the seven climbers deaths. This nearly pyramidal mountain lies in the canton of Valais. For ten points, name this last major mountain in the Alps to be climbed, which sits on the Swiss-Italian border.
questions.questionZh: 采尔马特村俯瞰着这座山，是攀登这座山的大本营。这座山的意大利一侧从布勒伊 - 切尔维尼亚村可以到达。请说出这座阿尔卑斯山峰。

questions.question: The first one of these locations was founded by C.E. Borchgrevink on Ridley Beach. The southernmost Chinese operated one of these locations is known as Kunlun. The largest one of these places is named for being located on McMurdo Sound. One of these locations named for Amundsen-Scott is located at the south pole. For ten points, name these scientific facilities located on the southernmost continent.
questions.questionZh: 第一个此类地点由 C.E. 博尔赫格雷文克在里德利海滩建立。最南端的中国人运营的一个此类地点是昆仑站。请说出这种研究设施类型。

questions.question: This mountain was formerly home to the Drygalski Glacier. This mountain’s current glaciers include the Furtwangler and Rebmann glaciers. This mountain’s peaks of Mawenzi and Kibo are separated by the Saddle Plateau. This mountain is known as Uharu in the Swahili language. For ten points, name this extinct stratovolcano in Tanzania, the tallest mountain in Africa.
questions.questionZh: 这座山曾是德里加尔斯基冰川的所在地。这座山目前的冰川包括富特旺格勒冰川和雷布曼冰川。这是非洲最高峰。请说出这座山。

questions.question: The British Overseas Territories of Akrotiri and Dhekelia are located on this island. This island is divided by the Green Line, with its northern half being an unrecognized independent country. This island is home to the Kyrenia and Troodos mountains. This island is shared by Turkish and Greek inhabitants and has its capital at Nicosia. For ten points, name this large Mediterranean island found south of Turkey.

options.label: C
options.textZh: 塞浦路斯第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 英国海外领土阿克罗蒂里和德凯利亚位于这个岛上。这个岛被希腊绿线和北部的"北塞浦路斯"分割。请说出这个地中海岛屿。

questions.question: The only non-American alligator species in the world is endemic to this river, which also names a species of finless porpoise. This river was formerly home to the baiji river dolphin, which was harmed by the construction of the Three Gorges Dam. This river flows into the East China Sea near Shanghai. For ten points, name this Chinese river, the longest river in Asia.

options.label: B
options.textZh: 塞浦路斯第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 世界上唯一非美洲的短吻鳄物种是这个河流的特有种，这个河流还有一种无鳍江豚。这个河流是中国南方的主要河流。请说出这条河流。

questions.question: This location is home to a set of multicolored springs called the Artist’s Paintpots which are located in the Gibbon Geyser Basin. The Morning Glory Pool, a yellow and blue spring, is located in this park. This park is home to a geyser named due to erupting at regular intervals. Old Faithful is located in, for ten points, what National Park found mostly in Wyoming, the oldest in the United States?
questions.questionZh: 这个地点有一个名为"艺术家调色板"的彩色温泉群，位于吉本间歇泉盆地。这个美国国家公园以老忠实间歇泉闻名。请说出这个地点。

questions.question: The mouth of the Catatumbo River in this country is home to a perpetual lightning storm. That river empties into this country’s lake Maracaibo. This country is also home to where the Orinoco River empties into the Caribbean Sea. This country is home to the highest uninterrupted waterfall in the world, Angel Falls. For ten points, name this South American country east of Colombia with capital Caracas.

options.label: C
options.textZh: 塞浦路斯第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 卡塔通博河河口在这个国家，这里有持续的闪电风暴。这条河注入这个国家的马拉开波湖。这个国家以石油资源丰富著称。请说出这个南美国家。

questions.question: Lago Alajuela’s flooding caused the closure of this structure. This structure was created following the Hay-Bunau-Varilla Treaty. This structure is crossed by the Bridge of the Americas. This structure Gatun Lake and the Gaillard Cut lie along this structure. For ten points, name this structure that connects the Caribbean Sea to the Pacific Ocean, a waterway through its namesake Central American country.
questions.questionZh: 阿拉胡埃拉湖（Lago Alajuela）的洪水导致这个建筑的关闭。这个建筑是在海 - 布诺 - 瓦里拉条约（Hay-Bunau-Varilla Treaty）后建造的。请说出这个连接两大洋的运河。

questions.question: This country’s southernmost portion is St. Martin’s Island, which lies at the mouth of the Naf River. This country’s current construction boom is fueled by the stone industry in the town of Jaflong. This country’s principle port is located at Chittagong, which is located near this country’s border with Myanmar. For ten points, name this low lying south Asian country with capital Dhaka.
questions.questionZh: 该国最南端是圣马丁岛，位于纳夫河河口。该国目前的国旗上有红色圆盘和绿色背景。首都是达卡。请说出这个南亚国家。

questions.question: These structures can be confirmed by the presence of breccia and shatter cones. The largest verified example of these structures is found near Vredefort, South Africa. Mt. Mazama in Oregon holds a lake named for being in one of these structures. Volcanic eruptions sometimes form, for ten points, what structures whose impact variety is created when meteors or asteroids collide with the Earth?
questions.questionZh: 这些结构可以通过角砾岩和震裂锥的存在来确认。已确认的最大此类结构是位于墨西哥的希克苏鲁伯陨石坑。请说出这种地质结构。

questions.question: In this country, theme parks like Dreamworld and Wet’n’Wild are located in the city of Gold Coast. Another beach town in this country is Byron Bay, which is known for its humpback whales. This country’s other coastal towns include Darwin, Perth, and Adelaide. The Bass Strait in this country contains its city of Melbourne. For ten points, name this land “Down Under” with capital Canberra.
questions.questionZh: 在这个国家，梦幻世界和 Wet n Wild 等主题公园位于黄金海岸市。另一个海滨小镇拜伦湾以灯塔和冲浪闻名。请说出这个大洋洲国家。

questions.question: The largest example of these structures is Borobudur, located in Java, Indonesia. Reliquaries in these structures are known as stupas. In East Asia, these structures are often accompanied by tiered towers called Pagodas. Although originally founded as a Hindu Temple, Angkor Wat now serves as one of these structures. For ten points, name these buildings, where practitioners of a religion founded by Siddartha Guatama worship.
questions.questionZh: 这种建筑的最大例子是位于印度尼西亚爪哇的婆罗浮屠。这种建筑中的舍利龛被称为"窣堵坡"（stupa）。请说出这种佛教建筑。

questions.question: This island’s Kalimantan states are home to the Dayak people, who were oppressed by the Brooke Raja regime on this island. This island’s north contains the state of Sabah, while the state of Sarawak on this island is home to an orangutan reservation. The Sultanate of Brunei is located on, for ten points, what island split between Malaysia and Indonesia, the third largest in the world?
questions.questionZh: 这个岛屿的加里曼丹诸州是达雅克人的家园，他们曾受布鲁克拉惹政权压迫。这个岛屿被马来西亚、印度尼西亚和文莱三国分割。请说出这个岛屿。

questions.question: The Lorelai Rock sits on the shores of this river, where a beautiful maiden was said to lure sailors into crashing their ships. The Neckar and Main rivers flow into this other river, which flows past the city of Cologne. This river forms the borders between Liechtenstein, Austria, and Switzerland. For ten points, name this European river that flows through Germany on its way to the North Sea.

options.label: D
options.text: The Rhine Page 1 IGB Regionals 2019-2020 Round 2
options.textZh: 莱茵河第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 2 轮

questions.questionZh: 罗蕾莱岩石位于这条河的岸边，传说一位美丽的少女曾引诱水手触礁。这条河是德国最长的河流，流经科隆和杜塞尔多夫。请说出这条河流。

questions.question: This mountain’s north and south summits were renamed in honor of Winston Churchill in 1965. The Kahiltna Glacier originated from this mountain. William Dickey is credited with discovering this mountain, whose name translated from Athabaskan as “the High One.” For ten points, identify this Alaskan mountain, formerly named for an American President, the tallest in North America.
questions.questionZh: 这座山的北峰和南峰于 1965 年为纪念温斯顿·丘吉尔而改名。卡希尔特纳冰川发源于这座山。这是北美最高峰。请说出这座山。

questions.question: This archipelago’s largest volcano is located on Fernandina Island. The largest island in this archipelago is Isabella. This archipelago is the only native habitat of the flightless cormorant and the marine iguana. The Voyage of the Beagle was written about a trip to this archipelago. For ten points, name this archipelago off the coast of Ecuador, where Charles Darwin studied its tortoises and finches.

options.label: C
options.text: The Rhine Page 1 IGB Regionals 2019-2020 Round 2
options.textZh: 莱茵河第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 2 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个群岛最大的火山位于费尔南迪纳岛。这个群岛最大的岛屿是伊莎贝拉岛。这个群岛以独特的野生动物闻名，达尔文曾在此考察。请说出这个群岛。

questions.question: This country is home to a vegetarian dish eaten by monks called Buddha’s delight. Another dish from this country is prepared by aging an egg in a mixture of clay, ash, salt, and quicklime. In addition to century eggs, this country is home to a pastry filled with red bean paste that is eaten during the Mid-Autumn festival. Mooncakes are from, for ten points, what country whose other dishes include chow mein?
questions.questionZh: 这个国家有一道僧人食用的素食菜肴叫"罗汉斋"。另一道菜是用北京鸭制作的。这个国家的首都是北京。请说出这个东亚国家。

questions.question: This desert is home to the Dohone Spur, which contains the mountain Bikku Bitti. The shield volcano Emi Koussi is the highest peak found in this desert. Both of those mountains are found in this desert’s Tibesti Mountains. This desert is home to the Tuareg people. This desert extends from the Sahel to the Mediterranean Sea. For ten points, name this largest desert in the world, located in northern Africa.
questions.questionZh: 这个沙漠有多霍内斯普尔，其中包含比库比蒂山。盾状火山埃米库西是这个沙漠的最高点。这个沙漠横跨非洲北部。请说出这个沙漠。

questions.question: This country is home to the Ascension Cathedral, which is made of wood without nails. This country is home to the elliptical shaped Baikonur Cosmodrome, which is leased to Russia. In 2019, this country changed its capital’s name to Nur-Sultan. This country contains the northern Aral Sea and is the world’s largest landlocked nation. For ten points, name this central Asian country home to Almaty and Astana.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家有阿森松大教堂，这座教堂是用木头不用钉子建造的。这个国家有椭圆形的拜科努尔航天发射场。首都是阿斯塔纳（现名努尔苏丹）。请说出这个中亚国家。

questions.question: The northern portion of this country is home to a forest of namesake pineyard trees The Turks and Caicos Islands lie to the southeast of this country. This country is home to the Exuma district as well as Andros Island and Great Inagua. This country’s most populous island is New Providence. For ten points, name this archipelago country governed from Nassau, which lies east of Florida and north of Cuba.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家北部有以其命名的松林；特克斯和凯科斯群岛位于其东南。该国包括埃克苏马区、安德罗斯岛和大伊纳瓜岛，人口最多的岛是新普罗维登斯岛。请说出这个由拿骚治理、位于佛罗里达以东且古巴以北的群岛国。

questions.question: This country is home to two large ergs named Grand Erg Occidental and Grand Erg Oriental. This country is home to the Ahaggar Mountains, which are home to this country’s highest point of Mt. Tahat. This country’s cities of Constantine and Oran both lie along the Mediteranean. For ten points, name this country sandwiched between Tunisia and Morocco, the largest in Africa.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家有两个名为"大西 erg"和"大东 erg"的大型沙海。这个国家有阿哈加尔山脉。首都是阿尔及尔。请说出这个北非国家。

questions.question: This island is home to the Koules Fortress, which was built built by the Venetians while they ruled this island as the Kingdom of Candia. Sir Arthur Evans identified one site on this island with the labyrinth that held the minotaur. The city of Knossos was home to the Minoan civilization on this island. Heraklion is the largest city on, for ten points, what largest Greek island?
questions.questionZh: 这个岛上有 Koules 堡垒，是威尼斯人统治克里特王国时建造的。这个岛上的克诺索斯宫殿是米诺斯文明的中心。请说出这个希腊岛屿。

questions.question: This city is home to the Victoria & Albert Waterfront, which sits on Table Bay Harbor. Robben Island sits off the coast of this city and is where Nelson Mandela was held prisoner. Table Mountain forms the backdrop of this city. This city serves as one of its country’s capitals, along with Bloemfountein and Pretoria. For ten points, name this second largest South African city after Johannesburg.

options.label: B
options.textZh: 也门第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 3 轮

questions.questionZh: 这座城市的维多利亚和阿尔弗雷德海滨位于桌湾港。罗本岛位于这个城市海岸外。这个城市以桌山闻名。请说出南非的立法首都。

questions.question: The southern end of the Tihamah coastal plains lie in this country, which is also home to the eastern edge of the Bab-el-Mandeb. This country controls the islands of Hanish and Socotra. The city of Ataq serves as the de facto capital of this country due to this country’s Houthi rebels. Aden is the main port in this country whose largest city is Sana’a. For ten points, name this country on the southern end of the Arabian peninsula.

options.label: C
options.textZh: 也门第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 3 轮

questions.questionZh: 提哈马（Tihamah）沿海平原的南端位于这个国家，该国还有巴布曼德布海峡的东缘。首都是萨那。请说出这个阿拉伯半岛国家。

questions.question: The northern portion of this body of water is home to Jugo [you-go] and Bora winds, which can drive the creation of sea ice. Cities on this body of water include Dubrovnik and Neum. This body of water is linked to the Ionian Sea by the Strait of Otranto. This body of water’s northern tip contains Venice. For ten points, name this arm of the Mediterranean, a sea that lies between Italy and Croatia.

options.label: C
options.textZh: 也门第 1 页 IGB 地区赛 2019-2020 第 3 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个水域的北部有 Jugo 和 Bora 风，它们可以推动海浪的形成。这个水域位于意大利和巴尔干半岛之间。请说出这个海域。

questions.question: In December of 2019, Judge David Briones ruled that a structure being built at this location had illegally acquired funds. Reciprocating saws have been used to cut holes in one structure at this location by drug smugglers. During the 2016 campaign, Donald Trump promised to build a fortification along this location. For ten points, name this location where Donald Trump wants to build a wall.
questions.questionZh: 2019 年 12 月，法官戴维·布里奥内斯裁定在这个地点建造的一座建筑非法获得了资金。这个建筑位于美国与墨西哥边境。请说出这个建筑项目。

questions.question: This city’s Old Woman’s Island and Colaba Island are both linked to the mainland by the Colaba causeway. This city was built on the islands of Salsette and Trombay, which were part of the Seven Islands of this city. This city is the largest in the Maharashtra State and is the center of the Bollywood film industry. Bombay was the former name of, for ten points, what largest city in India?
questions.questionZh: 这座城市的 Old Woman 岛和 Colaba 岛都通过 Colaba 堤道与大陆相连。这座城市曾是英国东印度公司的据点。请说出这座印度城市。

questions.question: This state is home to the Wasatch range, which includes the cities of West Valley and Ogden. This state is also home to the Sundance Resort in its city of Provo. This state was formerly known as the Deseret Territory and was settled by followers of Brigham Young. For ten points, what U.S. state is home to the headquarters of the Mormon Church and has its capital at Salt Lake City.
questions.questionZh: 这个州有瓦萨奇山脉，其中包括西谷城和奥格登市。这个州有大盐湖和盐湖城。请说出这个美国州。

questions.question: This country’s main islands are separated by the bay High Water, while its smaller islands are separated by the Koro Sea. This country is served by the Nadi International Airport. This country’s Mount Tomanivi is the headwaters of its widest river, the Rewa River. The islands of Viti Levu and Vanua Lau are located in, for ten points, what South Pacific Oceanic country with capital Suva?
questions.questionZh: 这个国家的主要岛屿被"高水位湾"（High Water）分隔，而较小的岛屿被科罗海分隔。首都是苏瓦。请说出这个太平洋岛国。

questions.question: This country’s highest peak of Tukosmera and Sulphur Bay are the center of the John Frum cargo cult. The Bislama creole is from this country. Pedro Fernandez de Queiros was the first European to land in this country, which was formerly known as the New Hebrides. Tanna and Espiritu Santo are islands in, for ten points, what Melenasian country between Fiji and the Solomon Islands governed from Port Vila.
questions.questionZh: 该国最高峰图科斯梅拉和硫磺湾是约翰·弗鲁姆货物崇拜的中心。该国的比斯拉马克里奥尔语是官方语言之一。请说出这个太平洋岛国。

questions.question: In 2018, one of these locations in London auctioned 1,200 rolls of toilet paper. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has forbidden flying LGBT pride flags at these locations, an order that some of these locations in Seoul and Chennai have defied. One of these locations was recently moved from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem. For ten points, name these locations where the United States is represented in foriegn countries.
questions.questionZh: 2018 年，伦敦的一个此类地点拍卖了 1200 卷卫生纸。国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥禁止美国官员访问这个地点。请说出这种外交场所。

questions.question: This country is home to the headwaters of the White Drin river and its highest point is Velika Rudoka. This country’s Rugova Canyon is located in its southwest region of Metohija. This country carried out an ethnic cleansing campaign against Serbs in the 1990s. Pristina is the capital of, for ten points, what Albanian majority country that declared independence from Serbia in 2008?
questions.questionZh: 这个国家有白德林河（White Drin）的源头，最高点是 Velika Rudoka。该国的鲁戈瓦国家公园以峡谷闻名。首都是普里什蒂纳。请说出这个巴尔干国家。

questions.question: This city’s Lekki neighborhood is home to the Nike Art Center. This city’s Ikoyi neighborhood is home to an artificial island called Banana Island, which was originally titled Lagoon City. This city is the center of the Nollywood film industry. This city is the largest city in Africa and was replaced by Abuja as its country’s capital. For ten points, name this largest city in Nigeria.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市的 Lekki 社区有耐克艺术中心。该市的 Ikoyi 社区有一个人工岛。这个国家是非洲人口最多的国家。请说出这座尼日利亚城市。

questions.question: This mountain range is home to Shenandoah National Park, which is contained in the subrange the Blue Ridge Mountains. This mountain range includes the subrange of the Black Mountains, which contain Mount Mitchell. This mountain range’s namesake trail terminates at Mt. Katahdin in Maine. For ten points, name this mountain range in the eastern United States, whose namesake trail starts in Georgia.
questions.questionZh: 这个山脉有仙纳度国家公园，该公园位于蓝岭山脉 subrange 中。这个山脉是阿巴拉契亚山脉的一部分。请说出这个山脉。

questions.question: This desert is home to the Oyu Tolgoi Project, which is operated by the Canadian company, Turquoise Hill Resources. The Dzungarian Basin and Tian Shan Mountains lie to the west of this desert. This desert is home to a supposed “death worm.” This desert is home to the Nemegt Basin, where the first dinosaur eggs were discovered For ten points, name this desert that covers northwest China and Mongolia.
questions.questionZh: 这个沙漠有 Oyu Tolgoi 项目，由加拿大公司 Turquoise Hill Resources 运营。戈壁沙漠横跨蒙古和中国。请说出这个沙漠。

questions.question: This archipelago is home to a fjord named San Carlos Water, which was an important landing spot for the British during one war. This archipelago is home to Brenton Loch, which is part of the Grantham Sound. Port Louis is the former capital of this archipelago, whose modern day capital is Stanley. For ten points, name this archipelago, which was the subject of a 1980s war between the U.K. and Argentina.
questions.questionZh: 这个群岛有一个名为圣卡洛斯水的峡湾，是英国人在某次战争中的重要登陆点。这个群岛的首府是斯坦利。请说出这个群岛。

questions.question: Just off the shore of this peninsula is the Chicxulub Crater, which may have been formed by the impact that wiped out the dinosaurs. That impact also formed the many cenotes sinkholes on this peninsula. The province of Campeche is located on this peninsula, as is the city of Cancun. For ten points, name this Mexican peninsula, which separates the Caribbean Sea from the Gulf of Mexico.
questions.questionZh: 这个半岛近海是希克苏鲁伯陨石坑，可能是导致恐龙灭绝的撞击地点。这个半岛位于墨西哥东南部。请说出这个半岛。

questions.question: This country’s national library is housed in the Casa Bauró. This country is home to the the ski resort town of Arinsal. This country’s two princes are comprised of the Bishop of Urgell and the President of France. Along with Spain, this is the only country where Catalan is an official language. The Pyrenees is home to, for ten points, what small country between France and Spain?
questions.questionZh: 该国的国家图书馆设在 Casa Bauró。该国有滑雪胜地阿里恩萨尔。这个国家位于法国和西班牙之间。请说出这个微型国家。

questions.question: This body of water is home to the sparsely populated Primeiras and Segundas Archipelago. The city of Moroni sits along this specific body of water on the island of Grande Comore. The disputed island of Mayotte lies within the northern end of this body of water. For the point, name this body of water which separates Madagascar from the mainland and shares its name with a country whose capital is Maputo.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家的国旗上有红色太阳和绿色背景。这个国家以恒河三角洲和茶产业闻名。首都是达卡。请说出这个南亚国家。

questions.question: Major mountain ranges on this island include the Hido and Kiso Ranges. Scenic Lake Biwa on this island lies in its Kansai region. Part of this island's southern coast is formed by the Kanmon Straits, which separate this island from Kyushu, while the Tsugaru Strait separates this island from Hokkaido to its north. For the point, name this largest and most populous Japanese island, the location of the city of Tokyo.
questions.questionZh: 这个州以"阳光之州"著称，拥有大沼泽地国家公园。该州的肯尼迪航天中心位于卡纳维拉尔角。首都是塔拉哈西。请说出这个美国州。

questions.question: One feature with this name hosts the Saint Catherine's Monastery and is located across from Mt. Catherine. One peninsula with this name is bounded on the west and east by the Gulf of Aqaba and the Gulf of Suez. That peninsula of this name makes up the southwest border of Gaza and Israel. For the point, give this common name of the mountain on which God gave Moses the Ten Commandments and a peninsula in Eastern Egypt.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家的鲁文佐里山脉被称为"月亮山"。该国是尼罗河的源头之一。首都是坎帕拉。请说出这个东非国家。

questions.question: This archipelago includes Baltra Island, which is also known as South Seymour. This archipelago sits atop the Cocos Ridge and the islands of this archipelago lie at the confluence of the Nazca and Cocos plates. This archipelago's islands include San Cristobal, Fernandina, and Isabela. For the point, name this Pacific archipelago controlled by Ecuador, the location of Charles Darwin's observations of some notable finches.
questions.questionZh: 这个群岛以查尔斯·达尔文的进化论研究闻名。这个群岛属于厄瓜多尔。首都是基多。请说出这个群岛。

questions.question: This region is home to Lake Manasarovar, which is considered sacred to the local Bon religion. This region is separated from the Tarim Basin by the Kunlun Mountains. A railroad stretching from Xining to this region’s capital is the highest in the world. This region’s status as the world’s highest and largest plateau has led it to be called the "Roof of the World." For the point, name this autonomous region of China with capital at Lhasa.

options.label: A
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee - Round 1
options.textZh: 青藏高原 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 - 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个国家的佩特拉古城是"新七大奇迹"之一。该国死海沿岸是世界最低点。首都是安曼。请说出这个中东国家。

questions.question: This river originates from the mountain of Thaba Putsoa, and its tributaries include the Vaal River. This river, which passes over the Augrabies Falls, discharges into the Atlantic Ocean at the Alexander Bay. This river originates in the Drakensberg Mountains in Lesotho. For the point, what is this colorfully- named African river which is at the center of a border dispute between Namibia and South Africa?

options.label: B
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee - Round 1
