questions.questionZh: 这个城市以"风城"著称，位于密歇根湖畔。该城市有 Willis Tower 和云门雕塑。请说出这个美国城市。

questions.question: One disputed territory in this body of water has been administered from Sansha since 1956. One country claims the territory within the "nine-dash line" in this body of water. This body of water is home to the heavily disputed Spratly and Paracel Islands. For the point, name this southeast Asian Sea located between Vietnam, the Philippines, and its namesake country.

options.label: A
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee - Round 1
options.textZh: 青藏高原 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 - 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个国家拥有世界最大的珊瑚礁系统大堡礁。该国首都是堪培拉，最大城市是悉尼。请说出这个大洋洲国家。

questions.question: Agriculture in this country is centered on the Beqaa Valley. This country's highest point is Qurnat as Sawda, or the "Black Peak." After Syria, this country has the second-largest Druze population in the world. Ancient cities located in this country include Byblos and Tyre. For the point, name this Middle Eastern country located north of Israel, which is governed from Beirut.
questions.questionZh: 这个山脉是欧洲最高山脉，有勃朗峰等著名山峰。这个山脉横跨法国、意大利、瑞士等国。请说出这个山脉。

questions.question: This country contains the headwaters of the Vuoksi River, which drains its Lake Saima. The Åland Islands are the territory of this country despite the islands' residents almost exclusively speaking Swedish. This country's namesake gulf separates it from Estonia. For the point, name this northern European country sometimes included in Scandinavia, whose capital is Helsinki.
questions.questionZh: 这个城市是印度科技中心，被称为"印度硅谷"。这个城市位于卡纳塔克邦。请说出这个印度城市。

questions.question: Users of this system can utilize the InTouch app to maintain an internet connection while using all parts of the system. This system includes stations such as Euston and Paddington, and commuters using this system pay using an Oyster Card. Those boarding vehicles on this system regularly hear the phrase "mind the gap." For the point, name this subway system in London, commonly called "The Tube."

options.label: C
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee - Round 1
options.textZh: 青藏高原 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 - 第 1 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个国家以郁金香和风车闻名。该国首都阿姆斯特丹有众多运河。请说出这个西欧国家。

questions.question: This desert's Makgadikgadi salt pan was a lake until approximately 10,000 years ago, and this desert still hosts large subterranean water reserves like Dragon's Breath Cave. Indigenous populations living east of this desert's Okavango inland delta speak Jul'hoan, a dialect of Khoisan. For the point, name this large desert in southern Africa covering much of Botswana and Namibia.
questions.questionZh: 这个岛屿是地中海第二大岛，以埃特纳火山闻名。这个岛屿属于意大利。请说出这个岛屿。

questions.question: After passing through the vale Polabí, this river receives the river Orlice near the city of Hradec Králové. This river rises in the Krkonoše Mountains of Bohemia, near the Czech-Polish border. The cities of Berlin and Prague reside within this river's sizeable drainage basin, which covers most of the former state of East Germany. For the point, name this central European river which empties into the North Sea after passing through Hamburg.

options.label: D
options.textZh: 新疆 [[SHIN-JYAHNG]] 维吾尔自治区

questions.questionZh: 这个国家有世界最长城墙之一的"哈德良长城"。该国由英格兰、苏格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰组成。请说出这个国家。

questions.question: This island includes Nanwan Monkey Island, which is actually a peninsula. This island's major waterways include the Xinwu and Nandu Rivers. This island's largest body of water is the artificial reservoir of Songtao. This island is governed from the city of Haikou, which sits on the nearby island of Haidian. For the point, name this island, which makes up a province of the southern coast of mainland China.
questions.questionZh: 这个沙漠是世界第二大热沙漠，横跨多个非洲国家。这个沙漠以撒哈拉命名。请说出这个沙漠。

questions.question: The Kalambo River ends in a 772-foot single-drop waterfall feeding into this lake. This lake's primary outflow is the Lukuga River, which traverses the northern edge of the Katanga Plateau. Lake Kivu drains into this lake via the Ruzizi, this lake's primary inflow. This lake is shared by four countries, including Burundi and Zambia. For the point, name this second- largest lake in the world by volume, the largest rift lake in Africa.
questions.questionZh: 这个城市是澳大利亚最大城市，有悉尼歌剧院和海港大桥。请说出这个澳大利亚城市。

questions.question: This archipelago's largest island is separated from the islands of Picton, Lennox, and Nueva by the Beagle Channel, named for the ship Charles Darwin used to traverse the region. This archipelago is bounded to the south by the Drake Passage, beyond which is Antarctica, and to the north by the Straits of Magellan, which separates this archipelago from the rest of Patagonia. For the point, name this archipelago shared by Argentina and Chile at the southern tip of South America.

options.label: B
options.text: Tierra del Fuego 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee – Round 2
options.textZh: 火地岛 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 – 第 2 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个国家以金字塔和狮身人面像闻名。该国首都是开罗。请说出这个北非国家。

questions.question: This island is home to statues of little men with mushrooms on their heads known as harubangs. This island's highest point is Hallasan, which is home to the Jonjaamji Pagoda. Nearly 300 people perished en route to this island in an April 2014 ferry disaster. This island's primary port is the city of Seogwipo. For the point, name this island off the southern coast of South Korea, a popular honeymoon destination.

options.label: A
options.text: Tierra del Fuego 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee – Round 2
options.textZh: 火地岛 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 – 第 2 轮

options.label: B
options.textZh: 新疆 [[SHIN-JYAHNG]] 维吾尔自治区

questions.questionZh: 这个群岛是印度洋上的热带天堂，以奢华度假村闻名。首都是马累。请说出这个岛国。

questions.question: In 1968, National Park Service director George Hartzog put an end to this national park's annual Firefall event at Glacier Point. This national park's O'Shaughnessy Dam supplies water and electricity to over two million people in San Francisco and the Bay Area. Ansel Adams photographed this national park's rock formations, including El Capitan and Half Dome. For the point, name this national park located in California's Sierra Nevada mountains.
questions.questionZh: 这个城市是巴西最大城市，有保利斯塔大道和伊比拉布埃拉公园。请说出这个巴西城市。

questions.question: As this river passes by the town of Sioma, it forms the Ngonye Falls. Features of this river include the Kariba and Cahora Bassa dams. This river passes over the Devil's Cataracts on its way to the Indian Ocean and includes Africa's largest waterfall, the Victoria Falls. For the point, name this southern African river that forms the border between Zambia and Zimbabwe.

options.label: D
options.textZh: 新疆 [[SHIN-JYAHNG]] 维吾尔自治区

questions.questionZh: 这个国家以斗牛和弗拉门戈舞闻名。该国首都是马德里。请说出这个南欧国家。

questions.question: Along with Haryana, a state named for this region is served by the capital city Chandigarh, while Lahore is the capital and main city of another state named for this region. This region's namesake language is the only tonal Indo- European language and was used to write the Adi Granth. For the point, name this region divided by India and Pakistan, the homeland of Sikhism.

options.text: Tierra del Fuego 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee – Round 2
options.textZh: 火地岛 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 – 第 2 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个岛屿是加勒比海最大岛屿，以雪茄和老爷车闻名。首都是哈瓦那。请说出这个岛屿国家。

questions.question: This region is home to the Bingtuan paramilitary group, which was originally founded to protect against Soviet aggression. This region was home to the Dzungars before a Qing genocide occurred. This region is located north of Tibet and contains the Tarim Basin. Administered from the city of Ürümqi, for the point, what is this autonomous region of western China, the ethnic homeland of the Uyghur people?

options.label: D
options.textZh: 新疆 [[SHIN-JYAHNG]] 维吾尔自治区

questions.questionZh: 这个城市是泰国首都，有大皇宫和卧佛寺。请说出这个城市。

questions.question: One island governed by this country is separated from the mainland by the Chacao Channel and has its capital at Castro. This country’s indigenous Mapuche people, who historically were concentrated in its south, compose nearly 10% of this country’s population. This country's southernmost region is governed from the city of Punta Arenas. The flag of this nation is very similar to the flag of Texas, except that the blue field is only in the upper left corner. For the point, name this narrow South American country whose capital is Santiago.

options.label: C
options.text: Federal Republic of Somalia 2020-21 V/JV Spring Geography Bee V/JV Spring Geography Bee - Round 3
options.textZh: 索马里联邦共和国 2020-21 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 V/JV 春季地理蜜蜂 - 第 3 轮

questions.questionZh: 这个国家以樱花和富士山闻名。该国首都是东京。请说出这个东亚国家。

questions.question: This country fought a namesake war with Britain in 1865 which led to its cession of the Cooch Behar Duars. This country is home to the Paro Taktsang monastery, and the Thunder Dragon Druk is depicted on this country's national flag. This country also is home to Gangkhar Puensum, the tallest unclimbed mountain in the world. This country, whose national language is Dzongkha, is ruled by the Wangchuck dynasty. For the point, name this small Himalayan monarchy whose capital is Thimphu.
questions.questionZh: 1865 年，这个国家与英国发生了一场同名战争，导致库赫·贝哈尔·杜阿尔 (Cooch Behar Duars) 的割让。

questions.question: Major cities on this island include Kupang and Baucau. This island, the largest of the Outer Banda Islands, has its highest point at Ramelau. The exclave of Oecusse lies on the western part of this island. The eastern half of this island was colonized by Portugal following the establishment of the capital city of Dili. For the point, name this Southeast Asian island split between Indonesia and a namesake country.
questions.questionZh: 该岛上的主要城市包括古邦和包考。

questions.question: One feature with this name is home to the Deux Mamelles, a pair of volcanoes whose name means "two udders." A country with this name is divided into the Barlavento and Sotavento Islands. That country of this name also includes the island of Pogo. The westernmost point on continental Africa has this name. For the point, give this name shared by a peninsula in Senegal and an island country whose capital is Praia.
questions.questionZh: 以这个名字命名的一个景点是 Deux Mamelles 的所在地，这是一对火山，其名字的意思是“两个乳房”。

questions.question: The shores of this body of water were formerly the site of the cities of Nguimi and Bol. questions.question: The city of Kuching is on this island and serves as the capital of the Sarawak State. This island's northern tip consists of the Sabah State, and the city of Bandar Seri Begawan is the capital of a sultanate located entirely on this island. For the point, name this third largest island in the world, which is divided between Malaysia, Indonesia, and Brunei.
questions.questionZh: 古晋市位于这个岛上，是砂拉越州的首府。

questions.question: Near the town of Sankt Gore, this river wraps around the Lorelei Rock. This river flows through Lake Constance, where it forms an inland delta. This river originates in Lake Tomasee in Switzerland and discharges in the Netherlands. Major cities along this river include Cologne and Dusseldorf. For the point, name this European river which forms the border between France and Germany.
questions.questionZh: 这条河位于圣戈尔镇附近，环绕着罗蕾莱岩。

questions.question: One feature with this name hosts the Saint Catherine's Monastery and is located across from Mt. Catherine. One peninsula with this name is bounded on the west and east by the Gulf of Aqaba and the Gulf of Suez. That peninsula of this name makes up the southwest border of Gaza and Israel. For the point, give this common name of the mountain on which God gave Moses the Ten Commandments and a peninsula in eastern Egypt.
questions.questionZh: 圣凯瑟琳修道院位于圣凯瑟琳山对面，以这个名字命名。

options.label: C
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 1
options.textZh: 青藏高原 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 1 轮

questions.question: This archipelago includes Baltra Island, which is also known as South Seymour. This archipelago sits atop the Cocos Ridge and the islands of this archipelago lie at the confluence of the Nazca and Cocos plates. This archipelago's islands include San Cristobal, Fernandina, and Isabela. For the point, name this Pacific archipelago controlled by Ecuador, the location of Charles Darwin's observations of some notable finches.
questions.questionZh: 该群岛包括巴尔特拉岛，也称为南西摩。

options.label: B
options.text: Chesapeake Bay 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 1
options.textZh: 切萨皮克湾 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 1 轮

questions.question: This river originates from the mountain of Thaba Putsoa, and its tributaries include the Vaal [[VAHL]] River. This river, which passes over the Augrabies [[aw-KRAH-beez]] Falls, discharges into the Atlantic Ocean at the Alexander Bay. This river originates in the Drakensberg Mountains in Lesotho [[leh-SOO=too]]. For the point, what is this colorfully- named African river which is at the center of a border dispute between Namibia and South Africa?
questions.questionZh: 这条河发源于塔巴普特索阿山，支流包括瓦尔[[VAHL]]河。

questions.question: One disputed territory in this body of water has been administered from Sansha since 1956. One country claims the territory within the "nine-dash line" in this body of water. This body of water is home to the heavily disputed Spratly and Paracel Islands. For the point, name this southeast Asian Sea located between Vietnam, the Philippines, and its namesake country.
questions.questionZh: 自1956年以来，该水域的一处有争议领土一直由三沙管辖。一国声称对该水域“九段线”内的领土拥有主权。

options.label: D
options.text: Tibetan Plateau 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 1
options.textZh: 青藏高原 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 1 轮

questions.question: Agriculture in this country is centered on the Beqaa [[beh-KAH]] Valley. This country's highest point is Qurnat as Sawda, or the "Black Peak." After Syria, this country has the second-largest Druze population in the world. Ancient cities located in this country include Byblos and Tyre. For the point, name this Middle Eastern country located north of Israel, which is governed from Beirut.
questions.questionZh: 这个国家的农业集中在贝卡 [[beh-KAH]] 山谷。

questions.question: This country contains the headwaters of the Vuoksi River, which drains its Lake Saima. The Åland [[AW-lund]] Islands are the territory of this country despite the islands' residents almost exclusively speaking Swedish. This country's namesake gulf separates it from Estonia. For the point, name this northern European country sometimes included in Scandinavia, whose capital is Helsinki.
questions.questionZh: 该国拥有沃克西河 (Vuoksi River) 的源头，该河是塞马湖的水源。

options.label: C
options.text: Chesapeake Bay 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 1
options.textZh: 切萨皮克湾 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 1 轮

questions.question: Major cities on this island include Kupang and Baucau. This island, the largest of the Outer Banda Islands, has its highest point at Ramelau. The exclave of Oecusse [[WEH- CYUSE]] lies on the western part of this island. The eastern half of this island was colonized by Portugal following the establishment of the capital city of Dili. For the point, name this Southeast Asian island split between Indonesia and a namesake country.
questions.questionZh: 该岛上的主要城市包括古邦和包考。

questions.question: The shores of this body of water were formerly the site of the cities of Nguimi [[NGWEE-mee]] and Bol. One proposal to restore this body of water was the Transqua Project, which would have redirected water from the Ubangi River. This Sahel lake has lost over 95% of its historic volume. For the point, name this rapidly drying-up African lake which shares its name with a country governed from N'Djamena [[un-jah-MAY-nah]].
questions.questionZh: 这片水域的海岸以前是恩吉米 [[NGWEE-mee]] 和波尔市的所在地。

options.label: B
options.text: Lake Chad 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 2
options.textZh: 乍得湖 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 2 轮

questions.question: According to local legend, these objects were transported to their current location by being "walked." By the mid-1800s, the only examples of these objects to have not been toppled were at Rano Raraku. Many of these objects were originally topped with a pukao, a red hat-like object which may have represented a chieftain's topknot. For the point, name these head-shaped monoliths created by the Rapa Nui people of Easter Island.
questions.questionZh: 据当地传说，这些物品是通过“步行”被运送到当前位置的。

options.label: A
options.text: Lake Chad 2020-21 Geography Bee One Geography Bee One - Round 2
options.textZh: 乍得湖 2020-21 地理蜜蜂一号 地理蜜蜂一号 - 第 2 轮

questions.question: On this island, the “black line” attempted to force natives out of the Forestier Peninsula. Convicts were resettled at Port Arthur, and Hobart is its capital. What island state of Australia is this?
questions.questionZh: 在这座岛上，“黑线”政策曾试图把原住民驱离福雷斯蒂耶半岛；囚犯也曾被安置到亚瑟港。其首府是霍巴特。这个澳大利亚的岛州是哪里？

questions.question: This inland desert includes Etosha and Makgadikgadi salt pans, and the Okavango flows through it in an endorheic basin. Name this desert in Namibia, Botswana, and South Africa.
questions.questionZh: 这片内陆沙漠拥有埃托沙与马卡迪卡迪盐沼，奥卡万戈河在其中形成内流盆地。请说出位于纳米比亚、博茨瓦纳和南非的这片沙漠。

questions.question: The PKK and Peshmerga are associated with this ethnic group, and many members live in Turkey, Syria, Iran, and Iraq. What Middle Eastern minority group is this?
questions.questionZh: 库尔德工人党（PKK）和佩什梅格都与这一族群相关，主要分布在土耳其、叙利亚、伊朗和伊拉克。这个中东少数民族是？

questions.question: Siida communities of the Sami herd this animal and use it to pull sleds; it also appears on the Canadian quarter. Name this type of deer.
questions.questionZh: 萨米人的 siida 社群会放牧这种动物并用其拉雪橇；它也出现在加拿大 25 分硬币上。请说出这种鹿。

questions.question: This city at the confluence of the American River and its namesake river is the capital of California. Name this city.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市位于美国河与其同名河流交汇处，是加利福尼亚州首府。它是哪座城市？

questions.question: The Shannon is the longest river of this country, whose major cities include Dublin, Cork, and Limerick. Name this country.
questions.questionZh: 香农河是该国最长河流，其主要城市包括都柏林、科克和利默里克。这个国家是？

questions.question: Sami people use this pachyderm for pulling sleds in some regions, and ivory is associated with it. Name this animal.
questions.questionZh: 在一些地区，人们会让这种厚皮动物拉雪橇，象牙也与其有关。请说出这种动物。

questions.question: Juba is the capital of this country, which became independent in 2011 and is the world’s newest country. Name it.
questions.questionZh: 朱巴是这个国家的首都。该国于2011年独立，被称为世界上最新成立的国家。它是？

questions.question: This name is shared by a historic port city in South Carolina and the capital of West Virginia. What city name is it?
questions.questionZh: 这个城市名同时对应南卡罗来纳州一座历史港口城市，以及西弗吉尼亚州首府。这个名字是？

questions.question: Located near the mouth of the Fraser River, this is the most populous city in British Columbia. Name this Canadian city.
questions.questionZh: 这座城市位于弗雷泽河口附近，是不列颠哥伦比亚省人口最多的城市。请说出这座加拿大城市。

questions.question: This planned city with many buildings by Oscar Niemeyer is the capital of Brazil. Name it.
questions.questionZh: 这座由奥斯卡·尼迈耶设计了许多建筑的规划城市，是巴西的首都。它是？

questions.question: This river forms part of the border between Germany and Poland and flows toward the Baltic near Szczecin. Which river is it?
questions.questionZh: 这条河构成德国与波兰部分边界，并在什切青附近流向波罗的海。它是哪条河？

questions.question: This civilization had Cusco as a major center and is famous for Machu Picchu. Which civilization is this?
questions.questionZh: 这一文明以库斯科为重要中心，并以马丘比丘闻名。它是哪个文明？

questions.question: Yellowstone National Park is largely in this U.S. state, whose capital is Cheyenne. Which state is this?
questions.questionZh: 黄石国家公园大部分位于这个美国州，该州首府是夏延。这个州是哪个？

questions.question: Nairobi is the capital of this East African country, and Mount Kenya is located there. Which country is it?
questions.questionZh: 内罗毕是这个东非国家的首都，肯尼亚山也位于该国。这个国家是？

questions.question: This region stretches from Yaviza and is a notorious break in the Pan-American Highway between Panama and Colombia. What is this region called?
questions.questionZh: 该地区从亚维萨一带开始，是巴拿马与哥伦比亚之间泛美公路著名的“断裂地带”。这个地区叫什么？
